"""
ìµœì¢… ì™„ë²½ ë²„ì „ - ë“±ì›/í•˜ì› íŒ¨í„´ìœ¼ë¡œ ì •í™•í•œ í•™ìƒ ì¶”ì¶œ
"""
import time
from datetime import datetime
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By
from colorama import init, Fore, Style
import re

init()

class FinalPerfectMonitor:
    def __init__(self):
        self.driver = None
        self.students = {}
        self.total_students = 81
        
    def setup_driver(self):
        """Chrome ë“œë¼ì´ë²„ ì„¤ì •"""
        options = webdriver.ChromeOptions()
        options.add_argument('--start-maximized')
        options.add_argument('--disable-blink-features=AutomationControlled')
        options.add_experimental_option("excludeSwitches", ["enable-automation"])
        options.add_experimental_option('useAutomationExtension', False)
        
        self.driver = webdriver.Chrome(options=options)
        print(f"{Fore.GREEN}[OK] Chrome ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ê°€ ì‹œì‘ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.{Style.RESET_ALL}")
        
    def open_website(self):
        """ì›¹ì‚¬ì´íŠ¸ ì—´ê¸° ë° ë¡œê·¸ì¸"""
        try:
            self.driver.get("https://attok.co.kr/")
            print(f"{Fore.YELLOW}[LOGIN] ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í˜ì´ì§€ë¡œ ì´ë™í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.{Style.RESET_ALL}")
            print(f"{Fore.CYAN}ìˆ˜ë™ìœ¼ë¡œ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í›„ ì¶œê²° í˜ì´ì§€ë¡œ ì´ë™í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”...{Style.RESET_ALL}")
            
            input(f"\n{Fore.GREEN}ì¤€ë¹„ë˜ë©´ Enterë¥¼ ëˆŒëŸ¬ì£¼ì„¸ìš”...{Style.RESET_ALL}")
            return True
                
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"{Fore.RED}ì˜¤ë¥˜ ë°œìƒ: {str(e)}{Style.RESET_ALL}")
            return False
            
    def extract_students_by_attendance_pattern(self):
        """ë“±ì›/í•˜ì› íŒ¨í„´ìœ¼ë¡œ ì •í™•í•œ í•™ìƒ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
        print(f"\n{Fore.CYAN}=== ì¶œê²° íŒ¨í„´ìœ¼ë¡œ í•™ìƒ ì¶”ì¶œ ==={Style.RESET_ALL}")
        
        students_found = {}
        
        try:
            # ì „ì²´ í˜ì´ì§€ í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ê°€ì ¸ì˜¤ê¸°
            page_text = self.driver.find_element(By.TAG_NAME, "body").text
            
            # ë“±ì›/í•˜ì› íŒ¨í„´ìœ¼ë¡œ í•™ìƒ ì°¾ê¸°
            # íŒ¨í„´: "ì´ë¦„ ë“±ì› ì‹œê°„/- í•˜ì› ì‹œê°„/-"
            lines = page_text.split('\n')
            
            i = 0
            while i < len(lines):
                line = lines[i].strip()
                
                # ë‹¤ìŒ ì¤„ í™•ì¸
                if i + 1 < len(lines):
                    next_line = lines[i + 1].strip()
                    
                    # "ë“±ì›"ì´ í¬í•¨ëœ ì¤„ ì°¾ê¸°
                    if "ë“±ì›" in next_line and "í•˜ì›" in next_line:
                        # í˜„ì¬ ì¤„ì´ í•™ìƒ ì´ë¦„
                        name = line
                        
                        # ì´ë¦„ ê²€ì¦ (ìµœì†Œí•œì˜ ì²´í¬ë§Œ)
                        if name and len(name) >= 1 and len(name) <= 30:
                            # ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ê°€ ì•„ë‹Œ ê²½ìš°
                            if not any(keyword in name for keyword in 
                                     ['ATTENDANCE', 'STUDENT', 'USER_', 'PARENT', 
                                      'MOBILE', 'FIELD', 'DEVICE', 'CLASS_']):
                                students_found[name] = {

                                }
                        i += 2  # ì´ë¦„ê³¼ ì¶œê²° ì •ë³´ë¥¼ ì²˜ë¦¬í–ˆìœ¼ë¯€ë¡œ 2ì¤„ ê±´ë„ˆë›°ê¸°
                        continue
                
                i += 1
            
            print(f"  ì¶œê²° íŒ¨í„´ìœ¼ë¡œ {len(students_found)}ëª… ë°œê²¬")
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"  ì¶”ì¶œ ì˜¤ë¥˜: {str(e)}")
        
        # ë°±ì—…: ul/li êµ¬ì¡°ì—ì„œë„ ì‹œë„
        try:
            ul_elements = self.driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "ul")
            
            for ul in ul_elements:
                li_items = ul.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "li")
                
                # 81ê°œ ê·¼ì²˜ì˜ lië¥¼ ê°€ì§„ ul ì°¾ê¸°
                if 70 <= len(li_items) <= 90:
                    print(f"\n  ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ì—ì„œ {len(li_items)}ê°œ í•­ëª© ë°œê²¬")
                    
                    for li in li_items:
                        text = li.text.strip()
                        lines = text.split('\n')
                        
                        if len(lines) >= 2:
                            name = lines[0].strip()
                            attendance = lines[1] if len(lines) > 1 else ""
                            
                            # ë“±ì›/í•˜ì› ì •ë³´ê°€ ìˆëŠ” ê²½ìš°ë§Œ
                            if "ë“±ì›" in attendance or "í•˜ì›" in attendance:
                                if name not in students_found:
                                    students_found[name] = {
                                        'name': name,

                                        'checked_in': "ë“±ì› -" not in attendance,

                                    }
                    break
                    
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"  ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì¶”ì¶œ ì˜¤ë¥˜: {str(e)}")
        
        self.students = students_found
        return students_found
        
    def display_results(self):
        """ê²°ê³¼ ì¶œë ¥"""
        print(f"\n{Fore.GREEN}=== ìµœì¢… ê²°ê³¼ ==={Style.RESET_ALL}")
        print(f"ëª©í‘œ: {self.total_students}ëª…")
        print(f"ì°¾ìŒ: {len(self.students)}ëª…")
        
        if len(self.students) == self.total_students:
            print(f"{Fore.GREEN}[SUCCESS] ì •í™•íˆ {self.total_students}ëª…ì„ ì°¾ì•˜ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!{Style.RESET_ALL}")
        elif len(self.students) < self.total_students:
            print(f"{Fore.YELLOW}[!] {self.total_students - len(self.students)}ëª…ì´ ë¶€ì¡±í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.{Style.RESET_ALL}")
        else:
            print(f"{Fore.YELLOW}[!] {len(self.students) - self.total_students}ëª…ì´ ì´ˆê³¼ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.{Style.RESET_ALL}")
        
        # ì „ì²´ ëª…ë‹¨ ì¶œë ¥
        sorted_names = sorted(self.students.keys())
        print(f"\n{Fore.CYAN}í•™ìƒ ëª…ë‹¨ (ì „ì²´ {len(sorted_names)}ëª…):{Style.RESET_ALL}")
        
        # 3ì—´ë¡œ í‘œì‹œ (ìˆ˜ì •ëœ ë²„ì „)
        cols = 3
        total = len(sorted_names)
        rows = (total + cols - 1) // cols
        
        for row in range(rows):
            line_parts = []
            for col in range(cols):
                idx = row * cols + col  # ìˆ˜ì •: í–‰ ìš°ì„  ìˆœì„œë¡œ ë³€ê²½
                if idx < total:
                    name = sorted_names[idx]
                    status = ""
                    if self.students[name].get('checked_in', False):
                        status = "*"  # ì¶œì„ í‘œì‹œ
                    # ì´ë¦„ì´ ë„ˆë¬´ ê¸¸ë©´ ìë¥´ê¸°
                    display_name = name[:14] + "." if len(name) > 15 else name
                    line_parts.append(f"{idx+1:3d}. {display_name:<15s}{status}")
            print("  ".join(line_parts))
        
        # í˜„ì¬ ì¶œì„ ìƒíƒœ
        checked_in = sum(1 for s in self.students.values() if s['checked_in'])
        print(f"\ní˜„ì¬ ì¶œì„: {checked_in}/{len(self.students)}ëª…")
            
    def monitor_attendance(self):
        """ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ì¶œì„ ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§"""
        print(f"\n{Fore.CYAN}=== ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ì¶œì„ ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ==={Style.RESET_ALL}")
        print(f"10ì´ˆë§ˆë‹¤ ì²´í¬, Ctrl+Cë¡œ ì¢…ë£Œ\n")
        
        last_attendance = {}
        for name, info in self.students.items():
            last_attendance[name] = info['checked_in']
        
        try:
            while True:
                # í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ ë˜ëŠ” ì¬ì¶”ì¶œ
                current_students = self.extract_students_by_attendance_pattern()
                
                # ë³€ê²½ì‚¬í•­ í™•ì¸
                changes = []
                for name, info in current_students.items():
                    if name in last_attendance:
                        if info['checked_in'] != last_attendance[name]:
                            if info['checked_in']:
                                changes.append(f"{name} ë“±ì›")
                            else:
                                changes.append(f"{name} í•˜ì›")
                            last_attendance[name] = info['checked_in']
                
                # í˜„ì¬ ì¶œì„ ì¸ì›
                checked_in = sum(1 for s in current_students.values() if s['checked_in'])
                
                timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%H:%M:%S')
                
                if changes:
                    print(f"[{timestamp}] ë³€ê²½ì‚¬í•­:")
                    for change in changes:
                        print(f"  - {change}")
                    print(f"  í˜„ì¬ ì¶œì„: {checked_in}/{len(current_students)}ëª…")
                else:
                    print(f"[{timestamp}] ì¶œì„: {checked_in}/{len(current_students)}ëª…", end='\r')
                
                time.sleep(10)
                
        except KeyboardInterrupt:
            print(f"\n\n{Fore.YELLOW}ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ì´ ì¢…ë£Œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.{Style.RESET_ALL}")
            
    def run(self):
        """ë©”ì¸ ì‹¤í–‰"""
        print(f"{Fore.CYAN}{'='*60}")
        print(f"   ìµœì¢… ì™„ë²½ ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ")
        print(f"   ë“±ì›/í•˜ì› íŒ¨í„´ ê¸°ë°˜ ì •í™•í•œ ì¶”ì¶œ")
        print(f"{'='*60}{Style.RESET_ALL}\n")
        
        # 1. ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹œì‘
        self.setup_driver()
        
        # 2. ë¡œê·¸ì¸
        if not self.open_website():
            return
            
        # 3. ì¶œê²° íŒ¨í„´ìœ¼ë¡œ í•™ìƒ ì¶”ì¶œ
        self.extract_students_by_attendance_pattern()
        
        # 4. ê²°ê³¼ í‘œì‹œ
        self.display_results()
        
        # 5. ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘
        print(f"\n{Fore.GREEN}ì¶œì„ ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ì„ ì‹œì‘í•˜ì‹œê² ìŠµë‹ˆê¹Œ? (y/n): {Style.RESET_ALL}", end="")
        if input().lower() == 'y':
            self.monitor_attendance()
            
    def cleanup(self):
        """ì •ë¦¬"""
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
            print(f"{Fore.GREEN}í”„ë¡œê·¸ë¨ì„ ì¢…ë£Œí•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.{Style.RESET_ALL}")


if __name__ == "__main__":

class FinalPerfectMonitor:
    def __init__(self):

    def setup_driver(self):

            print(f"{Fore.CYAN}ìˆ˜ë™ìœ¼ë¡œ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í›„ ì¶œê²° í˜ì´ì§€ë¡œ ì´ë™í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”...{Style.RESET_ALL}")
            
            input(f"\n{Fore.GREEN}ì¤€ë¹„ë˜ë©´ Enterë¥¼ ëˆŒëŸ¬ì£¼ì„¸ìš”...{Style.RESET_ALL}")

        except Exception as e:
            print(f"{Fore.RED}ì˜¤ë¥˜ ë°œìƒ: {str(e)}{Style.RESET_ALL}")
            return False
            
    def extract_students_by_attendance_pattern(self):
        """ë“±ì›/í•˜ì› íŒ¨í„´ìœ¼ë¡œ ì •í™•í•œ í•™ìƒ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
        print(f"\n{Fore.CYAN}=== ì¶œê²° íŒ¨í„´ìœ¼ë¡œ í•™ìƒ ì¶”ì¶œ ==={Style.RESET_ALL}")
        
        students_found = {}
        
        try:
            # ì „ì²´ í˜ì´ì§€ í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ê°€ì ¸ì˜¤ê¸°
            page_text = self.driver.find_element(By.TAG_NAME, "body").text
            
            # ë“±ì›/í•˜ì› íŒ¨í„´ìœ¼ë¡œ í•™ìƒ ì°¾ê¸°
            # íŒ¨í„´: "ì´ë¦„ ë“±ì› ì‹œê°„/- í•˜ì› ì‹œê°„/-"
            lines = page_text.split('\n')
            
            i = 0
            while i < len(lines):
                line = lines[i].strip()
                
                # ë‹¤ìŒ ì¤„ í™•ì¸
                if i + 1 < len(lines):
                    next_line = lines[i + 1].strip()
                    
                    # "ë“±ì›"ì´ í¬í•¨ëœ ì¤„ ì°¾ê¸°
                    if "ë“±ì›" in next_line and "í•˜ì›" in next_line:
                        # í˜„ì¬ ì¤„ì´ í•™ìƒ ì´ë¦„
                        name = line
                        
                        # ì´ë¦„ ê²€ì¦ (ìµœì†Œí•œì˜ ì²´í¬ë§Œ)
                        if name and len(name) >= 1 and len(name) <= 30:
                            # ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ê°€ ì•„ë‹Œ ê²½ìš°
                            if not any(keyword in name for keyword in 
                                     ['ATTENDANCE', 'STUDENT', 'USER_', 'PARENT',

                                students_found[name] = {

                                    'checked_in': "ë“±ì› -" not in next_line,

                        i += 2  # ì´ë¦„ê³¼ ì¶œê²° ì •ë³´ë¥¼ ì²˜ë¦¬í–ˆìœ¼ë¯€ë¡œ 2ì¤„ ê±´ë„ˆë›°ê¸°
                        continue
                
                i += 1
            
            print(f"  ì¶œê²° íŒ¨í„´ìœ¼ë¡œ {len(students_found)}ëª… ë°œê²¬")
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"  ì¶”ì¶œ ì˜¤ë¥˜: {str(e)}")
        
        # ë°±ì—…: ul/li êµ¬ì¡°ì—ì„œë„ ì‹œë„
        try:
            ul_elements = self.driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "ul")
            
            for ul in ul_elements:
                li_items = ul.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "li")
                
                # 81ê°œ ê·¼ì²˜ì˜ lië¥¼ ê°€ì§„ ul ì°¾ê¸°
                if 70 <= len(li_items) <= 90:
                    print(f"\n  ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ì—ì„œ {len(li_items)}ê°œ í•­ëª© ë°œê²¬")
                    
                    for li in li_items:

                        lines = text.split('\n')
                        
                        if len(lines) >= 2:
                            name = lines[0].strip()
                            attendance = lines[1] if len(lines) > 1 else ""
                            
                            # ë“±ì›/í•˜ì› ì •ë³´ê°€ ìˆëŠ” ê²½ìš°ë§Œ
                            if "ë“±ì›" in attendance or "í•˜ì›" in attendance:
                                if name not in students_found:

                                        'checked_out': "í•˜ì› -" not in attendance
                                    }
                    break
                    
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"  ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì¶”ì¶œ ì˜¤ë¥˜: {str(e)}")
        
        self.students = students_found
        return students_found
        
    def display_results(self):
        """ê²°ê³¼ ì¶œë ¥"""
        print(f"\n{Fore.GREEN}=== ìµœì¢… ê²°ê³¼ ==={Style.RESET_ALL}")
        print(f"ëª©í‘œ: {self.total_students}ëª…")
        print(f"ì°¾ìŒ: {len(self.students)}ëª…")
        
        if len(self.students) == self.total_students:
            print(f"{Fore.GREEN}[SUCCESS] ì •í™•íˆ {self.total_students}ëª…ì„ ì°¾ì•˜ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!{Style.RESET_ALL}")
        elif len(self.students) < self.total_students:
            print(f"{Fore.YELLOW}[!] {self.total_students - len(self.students)}ëª…ì´ ë¶€ì¡±í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.{Style.RESET_ALL}")
        else:
            print(f"{Fore.YELLOW}[!] {len(self.students) - self.total_students}ëª…ì´ ì´ˆê³¼ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.{Style.RESET_ALL}")
        
        # ì „ì²´ ëª…ë‹¨ ì¶œë ¥
        sorted_names = sorted(self.students.keys())
        print(f"\n{Fore.CYAN}í•™ìƒ ëª…ë‹¨ (ì „ì²´ {len(sorted_names)}ëª…):{Style.RESET_ALL}")
        
        # 3ì—´ë¡œ í‘œì‹œ (ìˆ˜ì •ëœ ë²„ì „)
        cols = 3
        total = len(sorted_names)
        rows = (total + cols - 1) // cols
        
        for row in range(rows):
            line_parts = []
            for col in range(cols):
                idx = row * cols + col  # ìˆ˜ì •: í–‰ ìš°ì„  ìˆœì„œë¡œ ë³€ê²½
                if idx < total:
                    name = sorted_names[idx]
                    status = ""
                    if self.students[name].get('checked_in', False):
                        status = "*"  # ì¶œì„ í‘œì‹œ
                    # ì´ë¦„ì´ ë„ˆë¬´ ê¸¸ë©´ ìë¥´ê¸°
                    display_name = name[:14] + "." if len(name) > 15 else name
                    # ì¶œì„ ìƒíƒœë¥¼ ì´ë¦„ ë’¤ì— í‘œì‹œ
                    if status:
                        display_line = f"{idx+1:3d}. {display_name:<15s} {status}"
                    else:
                        display_line = f"{idx+1:3d}. {display_name:<15s}"
                    line_parts.append(display_line)
            print("  ".join(line_parts))
        
        # í˜„ì¬ ì¶œì„ ìƒíƒœ
        checked_in = sum(1 for s in self.students.values() if s['checked_in'])
        print(f"\ní˜„ì¬ ì¶œì„: {checked_in}/{len(self.students)}ëª…")
            
    def monitor_attendance(self):
        """ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ì¶œì„ ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§"""
        print(f"\n{Fore.CYAN}=== ì‹¤ì‹œê°„ ì¶œì„ ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ==={Style.RESET_ALL}")
        print(f"10ì´ˆë§ˆë‹¤ ì²´í¬, Ctrl+Cë¡œ ì¢…ë£Œ\n")
        
        last_attendance = {}
        for name, info in self.students.items():
            last_attendance[name] = info['checked_in']
        
        try:
            while True:
                # í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ ë˜ëŠ” ì¬ì¶”ì¶œ
                current_students = self.extract_students_by_attendance_pattern()
                
                # ë³€ê²½ì‚¬í•­ í™•ì¸
                changes = []
                for name, info in current_students.items():
                    if name in last_attendance:
                        if info['checked_in'] != last_attendance[name]:
                            if info['checked_in']:
                                changes.append(f"{name} ë“±ì›")
                            else:
                                changes.append(f"{name} í•˜ì›")
                            last_attendance[name] = info['checked_in']
                
                # í˜„ì¬ ì¶œì„ ì¸ì›
                checked_in = sum(1 for s in current_students.values() if s['checked_in'])
                
                timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%H:%M:%S')
                
                if changes:
                    print(f"[{timestamp}] ë³€ê²½ì‚¬í•­:")
                    for change in changes:
                        print(f"  - {change}")
                    print(f"  í˜„ì¬ ì¶œì„: {checked_in}/{len(current_students)}ëª…")
                else:
                    print(f"[{timestamp}] ì¶œì„: {checked_in}/{len(current_students)}ëª…", end='\r')
                
                time.sleep(10)
                
        except KeyboardInterrupt:
            print(f"\n\n{Fore.YELLOW}ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ì´ ì¢…ë£Œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.{Style.RESET_ALL}")
            
    def run(self):
        """ë©”ì¸ ì‹¤í–‰"""
        print(f"{Fore.CYAN}{'='*60}")
        print(f"   ìµœì¢… ì™„ë²½ ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ")
        print(f"   ë“±ì›/í•˜ì› íŒ¨í„´ ê¸°ë°˜ ì •í™•í•œ ì¶”ì¶œ")
        print(f"{'='*60}{Style.RESET_ALL}\n")
        
        # 1. ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹œì‘
        self.setup_driver()
        
        # 2. ë¡œê·¸ì¸
        if not self.open_website():
            return
            
        # 3. ì¶œê²° íŒ¨í„´ìœ¼ë¡œ í•™ìƒ ì¶”ì¶œ
        self.extract_students_by_attendance_pattern()
        
        # 4. ê²°ê³¼ í‘œì‹œ
        self.display_results()
        
        # 5. ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘
        print(f"\n{Fore.GREEN}ì¶œì„ ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ì„ ì‹œì‘í•˜ì‹œê² ìŠµë‹ˆê¹Œ? (y/n): {Style.RESET_ALL}", end="")
        if input().lower() == 'y':
            self.monitor_attendance()
            
    def cleanup(self):
        """ì •ë¦¬"""
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
            print(f"{Fore.GREEN}í”„ë¡œê·¸ë¨ì„ ì¢…ë£Œí•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.{Style.RESET_ALL}")


if __name__ == "__main__":

    def run(self):

"""

"""
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By
from colorama import init, Fore, Style

init()

def precise_extraction():
    """ë¼ì¸ë³„ë¡œ ì •í™•íˆ ì¶”ì¶œí•˜ì—¬ ë°°ê²½ì´ ì–´ë””ì„œ ë‚˜ì˜¤ëŠ”ì§€ í™•ì¸"""

        input()

        body_element = driver.find_element(By.TAG_NAME, "body")

        bae_lines = []

            if line.strip().startswith('ë°°'):
                bae_lines.append((i, line.strip()))

                # ì „í›„ ë¼ì¸ë„ ì¶œë ¥
                if i > 0:
                    print(f"       ì´ì „: '{lines[i-1].strip()}'")
                if i < len(lines) - 1:
                    print(f"       ë‹¤ìŒ: '{lines[i+1].strip()}'")
                print()
        
        # ë“±ì›/í•˜ì› íŒ¨í„´ ì°¾ê¸°
        print(f"\n{Fore.YELLOW}[ë“±ì›/í•˜ì› íŒ¨í„´ ë¶„ì„]{Style.RESET_ALL}")
        students_with_attendance = []
        
        for i in range(len(lines) - 1):
            current = lines[i].strip()
            next_line = lines[i+1].strip() if i+1 < len(lines) else ""
            
            # ë“±ì›ê³¼ í•˜ì›ì´ ìˆëŠ” ë¼ì¸ ì°¾ê¸°
            if "ë“±ì›" in next_line and "í•˜ì›" in next_line:

                if current.startswith('ë°°'):
                    print(f"{Fore.RED}[!] ë°°ë¡œ ì‹œì‘: ë¼ì¸ {i+1}{Style.RESET_ALL}")
                    print(f"    ì´ë¦„: '{current}'")
                    print(f"    ì¶œê²°: '{next_line}'")
                    
                    # ë” ë§ì€ ì»¨í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì¶œë ¥
                    if i >= 2:
                        print(f"    -2: '{lines[i-2].strip()}'")
                    if i >= 1:

                    print(f"     0: '{current}'")
                    print(f"    +1: '{next_line}'")
                    if i+2 < len(lines):

                    print()
        
        # ê²°ê³¼ ìš”ì•½
        print(f"\n{Fore.GREEN}=== ìš”ì•½ ==={Style.RESET_ALL}")
        print(f"'ë°°'ë¡œ ì‹œì‘í•˜ëŠ” ë¼ì¸: {len(bae_lines)}ê°œ")
        print(f"ì¶œê²° ì •ë³´ê°€ ìˆëŠ” í•™ìƒ: {len(students_with_attendance)}ëª…")
        
        # ë°°ë¡œ ì‹œì‘í•˜ëŠ” í•™ìƒë“¤ë§Œ ì¶œë ¥
        bae_students = [s for s in students_with_attendance if s['name'].startswith('ë°°')]
        print(f"\në°°ë¡œ ì‹œì‘í•˜ëŠ” í•™ìƒ:")
        for student in bae_students:
            print(f"  - {student['name']}")
        
        # íŠ¹ìˆ˜ íŒ¨í„´ í™•ì¸
        print(f"\n{Fore.YELLOW}[íŠ¹ìˆ˜ íŒ¨í„´ í™•ì¸]{Style.RESET_ALL}")
        
        # ì—°ì†ëœ ê³µë°±ì´ë‚˜ íŠ¹ìˆ˜ë¬¸ì í™•ì¸
        for i, line in enumerate(lines):
            # íƒ­ì´ë‚˜ ì—¬ëŸ¬ ê³µë°±ì´ ìˆëŠ” ê²½ìš°
            if '\t' in line or '  ' in line:
                if 'ë°°' in line:
                    print(f"ë¼ì¸ {i+1}ì— íƒ­/ê³µë°± + 'ë°°' í¬í•¨:")
                    print(f"  ì›ë³¸: '{line}'")
                    print(f"  strip: '{line.strip()}'")
                    # ë°”ì´íŠ¸ ë‹¨ìœ„ë¡œ ì¶œë ¥
                    print(f"  ê¸¸ì´: {len(line)}, strip ê¸¸ì´: {len(line.strip())}")
        
        # ul/li êµ¬ì¡° ì§ì ‘ í™•ì¸
        print(f"\n{Fore.YELLOW}[UL/LI êµ¬ì¡° í™•ì¸]{Style.RESET_ALL}")
        
        ul_elements = driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "ul")
        for ul_idx, ul in enumerate(ul_elements):
            li_items = ul.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "li")
            
            # í•™ìƒ ëª©ë¡ì¼ ê°€ëŠ¥ì„±ì´ ìˆëŠ” ul (70-90ê°œ li)
            if 70 <= len(li_items) <= 90:
                print(f"\nUL #{ul_idx+1}: {len(li_items)}ê°œ í•­ëª©")
                
                # ë°°ë¡œ ì‹œì‘í•˜ëŠ” í•­ëª© ì°¾ê¸°
                for li_idx, li in enumerate(li_items):
                    li_text = li.text.strip()
                    if li_text.startswith('ë°°'):
                        print(f"  LI #{li_idx+1}: '{li_text}'")
                        
                        # innerHTML í™•ì¸
                        inner_html = li.get_attribute('innerHTML')
                        if 'ë°°ê²½' in inner_html:
                            print(f"    {Fore.RED}[!] innerHTMLì— 'ë°°ê²½' í¬í•¨{Style.RESET_ALL}")
                            
                        # ìì‹ ìš”ì†Œë“¤ í™•ì¸
                        children = li.find_elements(By.XPATH, "./*")
                        if children:
                            print(f"    ìì‹ ìš”ì†Œ {len(children)}ê°œ:")
                            for child in children:
                                child_text = child.text.strip()
                                if child_text:
                                    print(f"      - {child.tag_name}: '{child_text[:30]}'")
        
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"{Fore.RED}ì˜¤ë¥˜: {str(e)}{Style.RESET_ALL}")
    
    finally:
        input("\nEnterë¥¼ ëˆŒëŸ¬ ì¢…ë£Œ...")
        driver.quit()

if __name__ == "__main__":
    precise_extraction()

"""

import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import ttk, font
import threading
import time
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import winsound
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By
from selenium.webdriver.chrome.options import Options
import json

class AttendanceMonitorGUI:
    def __init__(self):
        self.root = tk.Tk()
        self.root.title("ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ")
        self.root.geometry("1200x800")
        self.root.configure(bg='#1e1e1e')
        
        # í•™ìƒ ë°ì´í„°
        self.students = {}
        self.driver = None
        self.monitoring = False
        
        # ìˆ˜ì—… ì‹œê°„ ì„¤ì • (ë¶„)
        self.class_duration = 120  # ê¸°ë³¸ 2ì‹œê°„
        
        # UI êµ¬ì„±
        self.setup_ui()
        
        # ìœˆë„ìš° ì¢…ë£Œ ì´ë²¤íŠ¸
        self.root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", self.on_closing)
        
    def setup_ui(self):
        """UI êµ¬ì„±"""
        # ìƒë‹¨ ì œì–´ íŒ¨ë„
        control_frame = tk.Frame(self.root, bg='#2d2d2d', height=80)
        control_frame.pack(fill=tk.X, padx=5, pady=5)
        
        # ì‹œì‘ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.start_btn = tk.Button(
            control_frame,
            text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘",
            command=self.start_monitoring,
            bg='#4CAF50',
            fg='white',
            font=('Arial', 14, 'bold'),
            width=15,
            height=2
        )
        self.start_btn.pack(side=tk.LEFT, padx=20, pady=15)
        
        # ìƒíƒœ í‘œì‹œ
        self.status_label = tk.Label(
            control_frame,
            text="ëŒ€ê¸° ì¤‘...",
            bg='#2d2d2d',
            fg='#ffffff',
            font=('Arial', 12)
        )
        self.status_label.pack(side=tk.LEFT, padx=20)
        
        # ì´ ì¸ì› í‘œì‹œ
        self.total_label = tk.Label(
            control_frame,
            text="ì¶œì„: 0/0ëª…",
            bg='#2d2d2d',
            fg='#00ff00',
            font=('Arial', 16, 'bold')
        )
        self.total_label.pack(side=tk.RIGHT, padx=20)
        
        # ë©”ì¸ í”„ë ˆì„ (ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ê°€ëŠ¥)
        main_frame = tk.Frame(self.root, bg='#1e1e1e')
        main_frame.pack(fill=tk.BOTH, expand=True, padx=5, pady=5)
        
        # ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ë°” ì¶”ê°€
        canvas = tk.Canvas(main_frame, bg='#1e1e1e', highlightthickness=0)
        scrollbar = ttk.Scrollbar(main_frame, orient="vertical", command=canvas.yview)
        self.scrollable_frame = tk.Frame(canvas, bg='#1e1e1e')
        
        self.scrollable_frame.bind(
            "<Configure>",
            lambda e: canvas.configure(scrollregion=canvas.bbox("all"))
        )
        
        canvas.create_window((0, 0), window=self.scrollable_frame, anchor="nw")
        canvas.configure(yscrollcommand=scrollbar.set)
        
        canvas.pack(side="left", fill="both", expand=True)
        scrollbar.pack(side="right", fill="y")
        
        self.student_frames = {}
        
    def create_student_card(self, name, parent):
        """í•™ìƒ ì¹´ë“œ ìƒì„±"""
        # ì¹´ë“œ í”„ë ˆì„
        card = tk.Frame(
            parent,
            bg='#3d3d3d',
            relief=tk.RAISED,
            borderwidth=2
        )
        card.pack(fill=tk.X, padx=10, pady=5)
        
        # ì™¼ìª½: ì´ë¦„ê³¼ ì¶œì„ì‹œê°„
        left_frame = tk.Frame(card, bg='#3d3d3d')
        left_frame.pack(side=tk.LEFT, fill=tk.BOTH, expand=True, padx=10, pady=10)
        
        # í•™ìƒ ì´ë¦„
        name_label = tk.Label(
            left_frame,
            text=name,
            bg='#3d3d3d',
            fg='#ffffff',
            font=('Arial', 14, 'bold')
        )
        name_label.pack(anchor='w')
        
        # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„
        time_label = tk.Label(
            left_frame,
            text="ë¯¸ì¶œì„",
            bg='#3d3d3d',
            fg='#888888',
            font=('Arial', 10)
        )
        time_label.pack(anchor='w')
        
        # ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½: ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„
        right_frame = tk.Frame(card, bg='#3d3d3d')
        right_frame.pack(side=tk.RIGHT, padx=20, pady=10)
        
        # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ (í¬ê²Œ í‘œì‹œ)
        timer_label = tk.Label(
            right_frame,
            text="--:--",
            bg='#3d3d3d',
            fg='#ff9800',
            font=('Digital-7', 36, 'bold')  # í° í°íŠ¸
        )

    def update_timers(self):

                                frame['card'].config(bg='#b71c1c')  # ì§„í•œ ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰

        self.monitoring = False

"""
ì‹¬í”Œí•œ GUI ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§
í•µì‹¬ ê¸°ëŠ¥ë§Œ êµ¬í˜„
"""
import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import ttk
import threading
import time
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import winsound
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By

class SimpleAttendanceGUI:
    def __init__(self):
        self.root = tk.Tk()
        self.root.title("ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§")
        self.root.geometry("800x600")
        
        # ë‹¤í¬ í…Œë§ˆ
        self.bg_color = '#2b2b2b'
        self.fg_color = '#ffffff'
        self.card_color = '#3c3c3c'
        
        self.root.configure(bg=self.bg_color)
        
        self.students = {}
        self.driver = None
        self.monitoring = False
        self.class_minutes = 120  # ê¸°ë³¸ 2ì‹œê°„
        
        self.setup_ui()
        
    def setup_ui(self):
        """UI ì„¤ì •"""
        # ì œëª©
        title = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 20, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        title.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ì‹œì‘ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.start_btn = tk.Button(
            self.root,
            text="â–¶ ì‹œì‘",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#4CAF50',
            fg='white',
            command=self.start_monitoring,
            width=20,
            height=2
        )
        self.start_btn.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ìƒíƒœ í‘œì‹œ
        self.status_label = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ëŒ€ê¸° ì¤‘...",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        self.status_label.pack()
        
        # ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í”„ë ˆì„
        container = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        container.pack(fill='both', expand=True, padx=20, pady=10)
        
        canvas = tk.Canvas(container, bg=self.bg_color, highlightthickness=0)
        scrollbar = ttk.Scrollbar(container, orient="vertical", command=canvas.yview)
        
        self.student_frame = tk.Frame(canvas, bg=self.bg_color)
        
        canvas.create_window((0, 0), window=self.student_frame, anchor="nw")
        canvas.configure(yscrollcommand=scrollbar.set)
        
        self.student_frame.bind(
            "<Configure>",
            lambda e: canvas.configure(scrollregion=canvas.bbox("all"))
        )
        
        canvas.pack(side="left", fill="both", expand=True)
        scrollbar.pack(side="right", fill="y")
        
        self.student_widgets = {}
        
    def start_monitoring(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.start_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.run_browser, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
        
    def run_browser(self):
        """ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.driver = webdriver.Chrome()
        self.driver.get("https://attok.co.kr/")
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ëŒ€ê¸°
        self.status_label.config(text="ë¡œê·¸ì¸í•˜ê³  Enter ëˆ„ë¥´ì„¸ìš”")
        input("ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í›„ Enter: ")
        
        self.monitoring = True
        self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì¤‘...")
        
        # ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘
        self.monitor_thread()
        
    def monitor_thread(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œ"""
        while self.monitoring:
            students = self.get_students()
            
            # UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ëŠ” ë©”ì¸ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
            self.root.after(0, self.update_ui, students)
            
            time.sleep(10)
            
    def get_students(self):
        """í•™ìƒ ì •ë³´ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
        result = {}
        
        try:
            ul_elements = self.driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "ul")
            
            for ul in ul_elements:
                li_items = ul.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "li")
                
                if 70 <= len(li_items) <= 90:
                    for li in li_items:
                        strong_tags = li.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "strong")
                        
                        if not strong_tags or not any("ë°°ê²½" in s.text for s in strong_tags):
                            text = li.text.strip()
                            if text:
                                lines = text.split('\n')
                                name = lines[0].strip()
                                
                                # ì¶œì„ í™•ì¸
                                checked_in = False
                                check_time = ""
                                
                                for line in lines[1:]:
                                    if "ë“±ì›" in line:
                                        if "ë“±ì› -" not in line:
                                            checked_in = True
                                            # ì‹œê°„ ì¶”ì¶œ ì‹œë„
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                        break
                                
                                result[name] = {
                                    'checked_in': checked_in,
                                    'check_time': check_time
                                }
                    break
        except:
            pass
            
        return result
        
    def update_ui(self, current_data):
        """UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸"""
        # ì²˜ìŒì´ë©´ ìœ„ì ¯ ìƒì„±
        if not self.student_widgets:
            row = 0
            col = 0
            
            for name in current_data:
                frame = tk.Frame(
                    self.student_frame,
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    relief=tk.RAISED,
                    borderwidth=1
                )
                frame.grid(row=row, column=col, padx=5, pady=5, sticky='ew')
                
                # ì´ë¦„
                name_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text=name[:10],  # ì´ë¦„ ê¸¸ì´ ì œí•œ
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 11, 'bold'),
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    fg=self.fg_color,
                    width=12
                )
                name_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ì‹œê°„
                time_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="--:--",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 10),
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    fg='gray',
                    width=8
                )
                time_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„
                remain_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14, 'bold'),
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    fg='orange',
                    width=8
                )
                remain_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                self.student_widgets[name] = {
                    'frame': frame,
                    'time': time_label,
                    'remain': remain_label
                }
                
                col += 1
                if col >= 2:  # 2ì—´ë¡œ í‘œì‹œ
                    col = 0
                    row += 1
        
        # ìƒíƒœ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        for name, data in current_data.items():
            if name in self.student_widgets:
                widget = self.student_widgets[name]
                
                if data['checked_in']:
                    # ì¶œì„í•¨
                    widget['frame'].config(bg='#1b5e20')  # ì§„í•œ ë…¹ìƒ‰
                    
                    # ì²˜ìŒ ì¶œì„í•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš°
                    if name not in self.students or not self.students[name]['checked_in']:
                        now = datetime.now()
                        self.students[name] = {
                            'checked_in': True,
                            'start_time': now,
                            'end_time': now + timedelta(minutes=self.class_minutes)
                        }
                        
                        # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
                        if data['check_time']:
                            widget['time'].config(text=data['check_time'], fg='lightgreen')
                        else:
                            widget['time'].config(text=now.strftime("%H:%M"), fg='lightgreen')
                    
                    # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ê³„ì‚°
                    if name in self.students:
                        end = self.students[name]['end_time']
                        remain = end - datetime.now()
                        
                        if remain.total_seconds() > 0:
                            minutes = int(remain.total_seconds() // 60)
                            seconds = int(remain.total_seconds() % 60)
                            
                            widget['remain'].config(
                                text=f"{minutes:02d}:{seconds:02d}",
                                fg='lightgreen' if minutes > 10 else 'yellow' if minutes > 5 else 'red'
                            )
                        else:
                            # ì‹œê°„ ì¢…ë£Œ
                            widget['remain'].config(text="ì™„ë£Œ!", fg='red')
                            widget['frame'].config(bg='#b71c1c')  # ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰
                            
                            # ì•Œë¦¼ìŒ
                            if not self.students[name].get('alerted'):
                                winsound.Beep(1000, 300)
                                self.students[name]['alerted'] = True
                else:
                    # ë¯¸ì¶œì„
                    widget['frame'].config(bg=self.card_color)
                    widget['time'].config(text="--:--", fg='gray')
                    widget['remain'].config(text="", fg='gray')
        
        # 1ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ (íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ìš©)
        if self.monitoring:
            self.root.after(1000, lambda: self.update_ui(current_data))
            
    def run(self):
        """ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", self.on_close)
        self.root.mainloop()
        
    def on_close(self):
        """ì¢…ë£Œ"""
        self.monitoring = False
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
        self.root.destroy()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = SimpleAttendanceGUI()
    app.run()

## GUI ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ ì™„ì„±!

ë‘ ê°€ì§€ ë²„ì „ì„ ë§Œë“¤ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:

### 1ï¸âƒ£ **simple_gui.py** (ì¶”ì²œ) - ì‹¬í”Œ ë²„ì „
```bash
cd attok-monitor
python simple_gui.py
```

**íŠ¹ì§•:**
- ê¹”ë”í•œ 2ì—´ ë ˆì´ì•„ì›ƒ
- í•™ìƒ ì´ë¦„ + ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ (ì‘ê²Œ)
- ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ (í¬ê²Œ, ìƒ‰ìƒ ë³€í™”)
- ì‹œê°„ ì™„ë£Œì‹œ ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰ + ì†Œë¦¬ ì•Œë¦¼

### 2ï¸âƒ£ **gui_monitor.py** - í’€ ë²„ì „
```bash
python gui_monitor.py
```

**íŠ¹ì§•:**
- ë” ë§ì€ ì •ë³´ í‘œì‹œ
- ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ ëŒ€í˜• í™”ë©´
- ìƒì„¸í•œ ìƒíƒœ í‘œì‹œ

## í•µì‹¬ ê¸°ëŠ¥:

"""
ì‹¬í”Œí•œ GUI ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§
í•µì‹¬ ê¸°ëŠ¥ë§Œ êµ¬í˜„
"""
import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import ttk
import threading
import time
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import winsound
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By

class SimpleAttendanceGUI:
    def __init__(self):
        self.root = tk.Tk()
        self.root.title("ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§")
        self.root.geometry("800x600")
        
        # ë‹¤í¬ í…Œë§ˆ
        self.bg_color = '#2b2b2b'
        self.fg_color = '#ffffff'
        self.card_color = '#3c3c3c'
        
        self.root.configure(bg=self.bg_color)
        
        self.students = {}
        self.driver = None
        self.monitoring = False
        self.class_minutes = 120  # ê¸°ë³¸ 2ì‹œê°„
        
        self.setup_ui()
        
    def setup_ui(self):
        """UI ì„¤ì •"""
        # ì œëª©
        title = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 20, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        title.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ì‹œì‘ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.start_btn = tk.Button(
            self.root,
            text="â–¶ ì‹œì‘",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#4CAF50',
            fg='white',
            command=self.start_monitoring,
            width=20,
            height=2
        )
        self.start_btn.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ìƒíƒœ í‘œì‹œ
        self.status_label = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ëŒ€ê¸° ì¤‘...",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        self.status_label.pack()
        
        # ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í”„ë ˆì„
        container = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        container.pack(fill='both', expand=True, padx=20, pady=10)
        
        canvas = tk.Canvas(container, bg=self.bg_color, highlightthickness=0)
        scrollbar = ttk.Scrollbar(container, orient="vertical", command=canvas.yview)
        
        self.student_frame = tk.Frame(canvas, bg=self.bg_color)
        
        canvas.create_window((0, 0), window=self.student_frame, anchor="nw")
        canvas.configure(yscrollcommand=scrollbar.set)
        
        self.student_frame.bind(
            "<Configure>",
            lambda e: canvas.configure(scrollregion=canvas.bbox("all"))
        )
        
        canvas.pack(side="left", fill="both", expand=True)
        scrollbar.pack(side="right", fill="y")
        
        self.student_widgets = {}
        
    def start_monitoring(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.start_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.run_browser, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
        
    def run_browser(self):
        """ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.driver = webdriver.Chrome()
        self.driver.get("https://attok.co.kr/")
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ëŒ€ê¸°
        self.status_label.config(text="ë¡œê·¸ì¸í•˜ê³  Enter ëˆ„ë¥´ì„¸ìš”")
        input("ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í›„ Enter: ")
        
        self.monitoring = True
        self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì¤‘...")
        
        # ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘
        self.monitor_thread()
        
    def monitor_thread(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œ"""
        while self.monitoring:
            students = self.get_students()
            
            # UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ëŠ” ë©”ì¸ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
            self.root.after(0, self.update_ui, students)
            
            time.sleep(10)
            
    def get_students(self):
        """í•™ìƒ ì •ë³´ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
        result = {}
        
        try:
            ul_elements = self.driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "ul")
            
            for ul in ul_elements:
                li_items = ul.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "li")
                
                if 70 <= len(li_items) <= 90:
                    for li in li_items:
                        strong_tags = li.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "strong")
                        
                        if not strong_tags or not any("ë°°ê²½" in s.text for s in strong_tags):
                            text = li.text.strip()
                            if text:
                                lines = text.split('\n')
                                name = lines[0].strip()
                                
                                # ì¶œì„ í™•ì¸
                                checked_in = False
                                check_time = ""
                                
                                for line in lines[1:]:
                                    if "ë“±ì›" in line:
                                        if "ë“±ì› -" not in line:
                                            checked_in = True
                                            # ì‹œê°„ ì¶”ì¶œ ì‹œë„
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                        break
                                
                                result[name] = {
                                    'checked_in': checked_in,
                                    'check_time': check_time
                                }
                    break
        except:
            pass
            
        return result
        
    def update_ui(self, current_data):
        """UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸"""
        # ì²˜ìŒì´ë©´ ìœ„ì ¯ ìƒì„±
        if not self.student_widgets:
            row = 0
            col = 0
            
            for name in current_data:
                frame = tk.Frame(
                    self.student_frame,
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    relief=tk.RAISED,
                    borderwidth=1
                )
                frame.grid(row=row, column=col, padx=5, pady=5, sticky='ew')
                
                # ì´ë¦„
                name_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text=name[:10],  # ì´ë¦„ ê¸¸ì´ ì œí•œ
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 11, 'bold'),
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    fg=self.fg_color,
                    width=12
                )
                name_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ì‹œê°„
                time_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="--:--",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 10),
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    fg='gray',
                    width=8
                )
                time_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„
                remain_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14, 'bold'),
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    fg='orange',
                    width=8
                )
                remain_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                self.student_widgets[name] = {
                    'frame': frame,
                    'time': time_label,
                    'remain': remain_label
                }
                
                col += 1
                if col >= 2:  # 2ì—´ë¡œ í‘œì‹œ
                    col = 0
                    row += 1
        
        # ìƒíƒœ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        for name, data in current_data.items():
            if name in self.student_widgets:
                widget = self.student_widgets[name]
                
                if data['checked_in']:
                    # ì¶œì„í•¨
                    widget['frame'].config(bg='#1b5e20')  # ì§„í•œ ë…¹ìƒ‰
                    
                    # ì²˜ìŒ ì¶œì„í•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš°
                    if name not in self.students or not self.students[name]['checked_in']:
                        now = datetime.now()
                        self.students[name] = {
                            'checked_in': True,
                            'start_time': now,
                            'end_time': now + timedelta(minutes=self.class_minutes)
                        }
                        
                        # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
                        if data['check_time']:
                            widget['time'].config(text=data['check_time'], fg='lightgreen')
                        else:
                            widget['time'].config(text=now.strftime("%H:%M"), fg='lightgreen')
                    
                    # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ê³„ì‚°
                    if name in self.students:
                        end = self.students[name]['end_time']
                        remain = end - datetime.now()
                        
                        if remain.total_seconds() > 0:
                            minutes = int(remain.total_seconds() // 60)
                            seconds = int(remain.total_seconds() % 60)
                            
                            widget['remain'].config(
                                text=f"{minutes:02d}:{seconds:02d}",
                                fg='lightgreen' if minutes > 10 else 'yellow' if minutes > 5 else 'red'
                            )
                        else:
                            # ì‹œê°„ ì¢…ë£Œ
                            widget['remain'].config(text="ì™„ë£Œ!", fg='red')
                            widget['frame'].config(bg='#b71c1c')  # ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰
                            
                            # ì•Œë¦¼ìŒ
                            if not self.students[name].get('alerted'):
                                winsound.Beep(1000, 300)
                                self.students[name]['alerted'] = True
                else:
                    # ë¯¸ì¶œì„
                    widget['frame'].config(bg=self.card_color)
                    widget['time'].config(text="--:--", fg='gray')
                    widget['remain'].config(text="", fg='gray')
        
        # 1ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ (íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ìš©)
        if self.monitoring:
            self.root.after(1000, lambda: self.update_ui(current_data))
            
    def run(self):
        """ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", self.on_close)
        self.root.mainloop()
        
    def on_close(self):
        """ì¢…ë£Œ"""
        self.monitoring = False
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
        self.root.destroy()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = SimpleAttendanceGUI()
    app.run()

            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 20, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        title.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ì‹œì‘ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.start_btn = tk.Button(
            self.root,
            text="â–¶ ì‹œì‘",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#4CAF50',
            fg='white',
            command=self.start_monitoring,
            width=20,
            height=2
        )
        self.start_btn.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ìƒíƒœ í‘œì‹œ
        self.status_label = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ëŒ€ê¸° ì¤‘...",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        self.status_label.pack()
        
        # ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í”„ë ˆì„
        container = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        container.pack(fill='both', expand=True, padx=20, pady=10)
        
        canvas = tk.Canvas(container, bg=self.bg_color, highlightthickness=0)
        scrollbar = ttk.Scrollbar(container, orient="vertical", command=canvas.yview)
        
        self.student_frame = tk.Frame(canvas, bg=self.bg_color)
        
        canvas.create_window((0, 0), window=self.student_frame, anchor="nw")
        canvas.configure(yscrollcommand=scrollbar.set)
        
        self.student_frame.bind(
            "<Configure>",
            lambda e: canvas.configure(scrollregion=canvas.bbox("all"))
        )
        
        canvas.pack(side="left", fill="both", expand=True)
        scrollbar.pack(side="right", fill="y")
        
        self.student_widgets = {}
        
    def start_monitoring(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.start_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.run_browser, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
        
    def run_browser(self):
        """ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.driver = webdriver.Chrome()
        self.driver.get("https://attok.co.kr/")
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ëŒ€ê¸°
        self.status_label.config(text="ë¡œê·¸ì¸í•˜ê³  Enter ëˆ„ë¥´ì„¸ìš”")
        input("ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í›„ Enter: ")
        
        self.monitoring = True
        self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì¤‘...")
        
        # ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘
        self.monitor_thread()
        
    def monitor_thread(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œ"""
        while self.monitoring:
            students = self.get_students()
            
            # UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ëŠ” ë©”ì¸ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
            self.root.after(0, self.update_ui, students)
            
            time.sleep(10)
            
    def get_students(self):
        """í•™ìƒ ì •ë³´ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
        result = {}
        
        try:
            ul_elements = self.driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "ul")
            
            for ul in ul_elements:
                li_items = ul.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "li")
                
                if 70 <= len(li_items) <= 90:
                    for li in li_items:
                        strong_tags = li.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "strong")
                        
                        if not strong_tags or not any("ë°°ê²½" in s.text for s in strong_tags):
                            text = li.text.strip()
                            if text:
                                lines = text.split('\n')
                                name = lines[0].strip()
                                
                                # ì¶œì„ í™•ì¸
                                checked_in = False
                                check_time = ""
                                
                                for line in lines[1:]:
                                    if "ë“±ì›" in line:
                                        if "ë“±ì› -" not in line:
                                            checked_in = True
                                            # ì‹œê°„ ì¶”ì¶œ ì‹œë„
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                        break
                                
                                result[name] = {
                                    'checked_in': checked_in,
                                    'check_time': check_time
                                }
                    break
        except:
            pass
            
        return result
        
    def update_ui(self, current_data):
        """UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸"""
        # ì²˜ìŒì´ë©´ ìœ„ì ¯ ìƒì„±
        if not self.student_widgets:
            row = 0
            col = 0
            
            for name in current_data:
                frame = tk.Frame(
                    self.student_frame,
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    relief=tk.RAISED,
                    borderwidth=1
                )
                frame.grid(row=row, column=col, padx=5, pady=5, sticky='ew')
                
                # ì´ë¦„
                name_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text=name[:10],  # ì´ë¦„ ê¸¸ì´ ì œí•œ
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 11, 'bold'),
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    fg=self.fg_color,
                    width=12
                )
                name_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ì‹œê°„
                time_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="--:--",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 10),
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    fg='gray',
                    width=8
                )
                time_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„
                remain_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14, 'bold'),
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    fg='orange',
                    width=8
                )
                remain_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                self.student_widgets[name] = {
                    'frame': frame,
                    'time': time_label,
                    'remain': remain_label
                }
                
                col += 1
                if col >= 2:  # 2ì—´ë¡œ í‘œì‹œ
                    col = 0
                    row += 1
        
        # ìƒíƒœ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        for name, data in current_data.items():
            if name in self.student_widgets:
                widget = self.student_widgets[name]
                
                if data['checked_in']:
                    # ì¶œì„í•¨
                    widget['frame'].config(bg='#1b5e20')  # ì§„í•œ ë…¹ìƒ‰
                    
                    # ì²˜ìŒ ì¶œì„í•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš°
                    if name not in self.students or not self.students[name]['checked_in']:
                        now = datetime.now()
                        self.students[name] = {
                            'checked_in': True,
                            'start_time': now,
                            'end_time': now + timedelta(minutes=self.class_minutes)
                        }
                        
                        # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
                        if data['check_time']:
                            widget['time'].config(text=data['check_time'], fg='lightgreen')
                        else:
                            widget['time'].config(text=now.strftime("%H:%M"), fg='lightgreen')
                    
                    # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ê³„ì‚°
                    if name in self.students:
                        end = self.students[name]['end_time']
                        remain = end - datetime.now()
                        
                        if remain.total_seconds() > 0:
                            minutes = int(remain.total_seconds() // 60)
                            seconds = int(remain.total_seconds() % 60)
                            
                            widget['remain'].config(
                                text=f"{minutes:02d}:{seconds:02d}",
                                fg='lightgreen' if minutes > 10 else 'yellow' if minutes > 5 else 'red'
                            )
                        else:
                            # ì‹œê°„ ì¢…ë£Œ
                            widget['remain'].config(text="ì™„ë£Œ!", fg='red')
                            widget['frame'].config(bg='#b71c1c')  # ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰
                            
                            # ì•Œë¦¼ìŒ
                            if not self.students[name].get('alerted'):
                                winsound.Beep(1000, 300)
                                self.students[name]['alerted'] = True
                else:
                    # ë¯¸ì¶œì„
                    widget['frame'].config(bg=self.card_color)
                    widget['time'].config(text="--:--", fg='gray')
                    widget['remain'].config(text="", fg='gray')
        
        # 1ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ (íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ìš©)
        if self.monitoring:
            self.root.after(1000, lambda: self.update_ui(current_data))
            
    def run(self):
        """ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", self.on_close)
        self.root.mainloop()
        
    def on_close(self):
        """ì¢…ë£Œ"""
        self.monitoring = False
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
        self.root.destroy()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = SimpleAttendanceGUI()
    app.run()

                )
                name_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ì‹œê°„
                time_label = tk.Label(

                    bg=self.card_color,
                    fg='gray',
                    width=8
                )
                time_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„
                remain_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,

                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14, 'bold'),

                )

                self.student_widgets[name] = {
                    'frame': frame,

                    'remain': remain_label
                }
                
                col += 1
                if col >= 2:  # 2ì—´ë¡œ í‘œì‹œ
                    col = 0
                    row += 1
        
        # ìƒíƒœ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        for name, data in current_data.items():
            if name in self.student_widgets:
                widget = self.student_widgets[name]
                
                if data['checked_in']:
                    # ì¶œì„í•¨
                    widget['frame'].config(bg='#1b5e20')  # ì§„í•œ ë…¹ìƒ‰
                    
                    # ì²˜ìŒ ì¶œì„í•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš°
                    if name not in self.students or not self.students[name]['checked_in']:
                        now = datetime.now()
                        self.students[name] = {
                            'checked_in': True,
                            'start_time': now,
                            'end_time': now + timedelta(minutes=self.class_minutes)
                        }
                        
                        # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
                        if data['check_time']:
                            widget['time'].config(text=data['check_time'], fg='lightgreen')
                        else:
                            widget['time'].config(text=now.strftime("%H:%M"), fg='lightgreen')
                    
                    # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ê³„ì‚°
                    if name in self.students:
                        end = self.students[name]['end_time']
                        remain = end - datetime.now()
                        
                        if remain.total_seconds() > 0:
                            minutes = int(remain.total_seconds() // 60)
                            seconds = int(remain.total_seconds() % 60)
                            
                            widget['remain'].config(
                                text=f"{minutes:02d}:{seconds:02d}",
                                fg='lightgreen' if minutes > 10 else 'yellow' if minutes > 5 else 'red'
                            )
                        else:
                            # ì‹œê°„ ì¢…ë£Œ
                            widget['remain'].config(text="ì™„ë£Œ!", fg='red')

                            # ì•Œë¦¼ìŒ
                            if not self.students[name].get('alerted'):

                                self.students[name]['alerted'] = True
                else:

                    widget['frame'].config(bg=self.card_color)
                    widget['time'].config(text="--:--", fg='gray')
                    widget['remain'].config(text="", fg='gray')
        
        # 1ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ (íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ìš©)
        if self.monitoring:
            self.root.after(1000, lambda: self.update_ui(current_data))
            
    def run(self):
        """ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", self.on_close)
        self.root.mainloop()
        
    def on_close(self):
        """ì¢…ë£Œ"""
        self.monitoring = False
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
        self.root.destroy()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = SimpleAttendanceGUI()
    app.run()

import tkinter as tk

import threading
import time
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import winsound
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By

class SimpleAttendanceGUI:
    def __init__(self):

        self.root.title("ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§")

        # ë‹¤í¬ í…Œë§ˆ
        self.bg_color = '#2b2b2b'

        self.root.configure(bg=self.bg_color)
        
        self.students = {}

    def setup_ui(self):

        )

        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ ë²„íŠ¼ (ì´ˆê¸°ì—ëŠ” ìˆ¨ê¹€)
        self.login_btn = tk.Button(

        )
        self.login_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ìƒíƒœ í‘œì‹œ
        self.status_label = tk.Label(

            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12),

        )
        self.status_label.pack()
        
        # ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í”„ë ˆì„
        container = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        container.pack(fill='both', expand=True, padx=20, pady=10)
        
        canvas = tk.Canvas(container, bg=self.bg_color, highlightthickness=0)
        scrollbar = ttk.Scrollbar(container, orient="vertical", command=canvas.yview)
        
        self.student_frame = tk.Frame(canvas, bg=self.bg_color)
        
        canvas.create_window((0, 0), window=self.student_frame, anchor="nw")
        canvas.configure(yscrollcommand=scrollbar.set)
        
        self.student_frame.bind(
            "<Configure>",
            lambda e: canvas.configure(scrollregion=canvas.bbox("all"))
        )
        
        canvas.pack(side="left", fill="both", expand=True)
        scrollbar.pack(side="right", fill="y")
        
        self.student_widgets = {}
        
    def start_monitoring(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.start_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.run_browser, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
        
    def run_browser(self):
        """ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.driver = webdriver.Chrome()
        self.driver.get("https://attok.co.kr/")
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ëŒ€ê¸° - GUI ë²„íŠ¼ìœ¼ë¡œ ì²˜ë¦¬
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ì—ì„œ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í›„ 'ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ' ë²„íŠ¼ì„ ëˆŒëŸ¬ì£¼ì„¸ìš”"))
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.login_btn.config(state='normal'))
    
    def confirm_login(self):
        """ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ í™•ì¸"""
        self.login_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        # ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘ì„ ë³„ë„ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.start_monitoring_loop, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
    
    def start_monitoring_loop(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ë£¨í”„ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.monitoring = True
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì¤‘..."))
        
        # ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘
        self.monitor_thread()
        
    def monitor_thread(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œ"""
        while self.monitoring:
            students = self.get_students()
            
            # UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ëŠ” ë©”ì¸ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
            self.root.after(0, self.update_ui, students)
            
            time.sleep(10)
            
    def get_students(self):
        """í•™ìƒ ì •ë³´ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
        result = {}
        
        try:
            ul_elements = self.driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "ul")
            
            for ul in ul_elements:
                li_items = ul.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "li")
                
                if 70 <= len(li_items) <= 90:
                    for li in li_items:
                        strong_tags = li.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "strong")
                        
                        if not strong_tags or not any("ë°°ê²½" in s.text for s in strong_tags):
                            text = li.text.strip()
                            if text:
                                lines = text.split('\n')
                                name = lines[0].strip()
                                
                                # ì¶œì„ í™•ì¸
                                checked_in = False
                                check_time = ""
                                
                                for line in lines[1:]:
                                    if "ë“±ì›" in line:
                                        if "ë“±ì› -" not in line:
                                            checked_in = True
                                            # ì‹œê°„ ì¶”ì¶œ ì‹œë„
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                        break
                                
                                result[name] = {
                                    'checked_in': checked_in,
                                    'check_time': check_time
                                }
                    break
        except:
            pass
            
        return result

                # ì´ë¦„
                name_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,

                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 11, 'bold'),
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    fg=self.fg_color,
                    width=12
                )
                name_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ì‹œê°„
                time_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,

                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 10),
                    bg=self.card_color,

                    width=8
                )
                time_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„
                remain_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14, 'bold'),
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    fg='orange',
                    width=8
                )
                remain_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                self.student_widgets[name] = {
                    'frame': frame,
                    'time': time_label,
                    'remain': remain_label
                }
                
                col += 1
                if col >= 2:  # 2ì—´ë¡œ í‘œì‹œ
                    col = 0
                    row += 1
        
        # ìƒíƒœ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        for name, data in current_data.items():
            if name in self.student_widgets:
                widget = self.student_widgets[name]
                
                if data['checked_in']:
                    # ì¶œì„í•¨
                    widget['frame'].config(bg='#1b5e20')  # ì§„í•œ ë…¹ìƒ‰
                    
                    # ì²˜ìŒ ì¶œì„í•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš°
                    if name not in self.students or not self.students[name]['checked_in']:
                        now = datetime.now()
                        self.students[name] = {
                            'checked_in': True,
                            'start_time': now,
                            'end_time': now + timedelta(minutes=self.class_minutes)
                        }
                        
                        # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
                        if data['check_time']:

                    if name in self.students:

                        remain = end - datetime.now()
                        
                        if remain.total_seconds() > 0:
                            minutes = int(remain.total_seconds() // 60)
                            seconds = int(remain.total_seconds() % 60)
                            
                            widget['remain'].config(
                                text=f"{minutes:02d}:{seconds:02d}",
                                fg='lightgreen' if minutes > 10 else 'yellow' if minutes > 5 else 'red'
                            )
                        else:
                            # ì‹œê°„ ì¢…ë£Œ
                            widget['remain'].config(text="ì™„ë£Œ!", fg='red')
                            widget['frame'].config(bg='#b71c1c')  # ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰
                            
                            # ì•Œë¦¼ìŒ
                            if not self.students[name].get('alerted'):

        # 1ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ (íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ìš©)
        if self.monitoring:
