"""
ì‹¬í”Œí•œ GUI ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§
í•µì‹¬ ê¸°ëŠ¥ë§Œ êµ¬í˜„
"""
import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import ttk
import threading
import time
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import winsound
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By

class SimpleAttendanceGUI:
    def __init__(self):
        self.root = tk.Tk()
        self.root.title("ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§")
        self.root.geometry("800x600")
        
        # ë‹¤í¬ í…Œë§ˆ
        self.bg_color = '#2b2b2b'
        self.fg_color = '#ffffff'
        self.card_color = '#3c3c3c'
        
        self.root.configure(bg=self.bg_color)
        
        self.students = {}
        self.driver = None
        self.monitoring = False
        self.logged_in = False
        self.class_minutes = 120  # ê¸°ë³¸ 2ì‹œê°„
        
        self.setup_ui()
        
    def setup_ui(self):
        """UI ì„¤ì •"""
        # ì œëª©
        title = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 20, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        title.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ë²„íŠ¼ í”„ë ˆì„
        button_frame = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        button_frame.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ì‹œì‘ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.start_btn = tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="â–¶ ì‹œì‘",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#4CAF50',
            fg='white',
            command=self.start_monitoring,
            width=15,
            height=2
        )
        self.start_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ ë²„íŠ¼ (ì´ˆê¸°ì—ëŠ” ìˆ¨ê¹€)
        self.login_btn = tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="âœ“ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#2196F3',
            fg='white',
            command=self.confirm_login,
            width=15,
            height=2,
            state='disabled'
        )
        self.login_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ìƒíƒœ í‘œì‹œ
        self.status_label = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ëŒ€ê¸° ì¤‘...",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        self.status_label.pack()
        
        # ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í”„ë ˆì„
        container = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        container.pack(fill='both', expand=True, padx=20, pady=10)
        
        canvas = tk.Canvas(container, bg=self.bg_color, highlightthickness=0)
        scrollbar = ttk.Scrollbar(container, orient="vertical", command=canvas.yview)
        
        self.student_frame = tk.Frame(canvas, bg=self.bg_color)
        
        canvas.create_window((0, 0), window=self.student_frame, anchor="nw")
        canvas.configure(yscrollcommand=scrollbar.set)
        
        self.student_frame.bind(
            "<Configure>",
            lambda e: canvas.configure(scrollregion=canvas.bbox("all"))
        )
        
        canvas.pack(side="left", fill="both", expand=True)
        scrollbar.pack(side="right", fill="y")
        
        self.student_widgets = {}
        
    def start_monitoring(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.start_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.run_browser, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
        
    def run_browser(self):
        """ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.driver = webdriver.Chrome()
        self.driver.get("https://attok.co.kr/")
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ëŒ€ê¸° - GUI ë²„íŠ¼ìœ¼ë¡œ ì²˜ë¦¬
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ì—ì„œ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í›„ 'ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ' ë²„íŠ¼ì„ ëˆŒëŸ¬ì£¼ì„¸ìš”"))
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.login_btn.config(state='normal'))
    
    def confirm_login(self):
        """ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ í™•ì¸"""
        self.login_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        # ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘ì„ ë³„ë„ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.start_monitoring_loop, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
    
    def start_monitoring_loop(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ë£¨í”„ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.monitoring = True
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì¤‘..."))
        
        # ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘
        self.monitor_thread()
        
    def monitor_thread(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œ"""
        while self.monitoring:
            students = self.get_students()
            
            # UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ëŠ” ë©”ì¸ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
            self.root.after(0, self.update_ui, students)
            
            time.sleep(10)
            
    def get_students(self):
        """í•™ìƒ ì •ë³´ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
        result = {}
        
        try:
            ul_elements = self.driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "ul")
            
            for ul in ul_elements:
                li_items = ul.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "li")
                
                if 70 <= len(li_items) <= 90:
                    for li in li_items:
                        strong_tags = li.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "strong")
                        
                        if not strong_tags or not any("ë°°ê²½" in s.text for s in strong_tags):
                            text = li.text.strip()
                            if text:
                                lines = text.split('\n')
                                name = lines[0].strip()
                                
                                # ì¶œì„ í™•ì¸
                                checked_in = False
                                check_time = ""
                                
                                for line in lines[1:]:
                                    if "ë“±ì›" in line:
                                        if "ë“±ì› -" not in line:
                                            checked_in = True
                                            # ì‹œê°„ ì¶”ì¶œ ì‹œë„
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                        break
                                
                                result[name] = {
                                    'checked_in': checked_in,
                                    'check_time': check_time
                                }
                    break
        except:
            pass
            
        return result
        
    def update_ui(self, current_data):
        """UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸"""
        # ì²˜ìŒì´ë©´ ìœ„ì ¯ ìƒì„±
        if not self.student_widgets:
            row = 0
            col = 0
            
            for name in current_data:
                frame = tk.Frame(
                    self.student_frame,
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    relief=tk.RAISED,
                    borderwidth=1
                )
                frame.grid(row=row, column=col, padx=5, pady=5, sticky='ew')
                
                # ì´ë¦„
                name_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text=name[:10],  # ì´ë¦„ ê¸¸ì´ ì œí•œ
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 11, 'bold'),
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    fg=self.fg_color,
                    width=12
                )
                name_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ì‹œê°„
                time_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="--:--",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 10),
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    fg='gray',
                    width=8
                )
                time_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„
                remain_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14, 'bold'),
                    bg=self.card_color,
                    fg='orange',
                    width=8
                )
                remain_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                self.student_widgets[name] = {
                    'frame': frame,
                    'time': time_label,
                    'remain': remain_label
                }
                
                col += 1
                if col >= 2:  # 2ì—´ë¡œ í‘œì‹œ
                    col = 0
                    row += 1
        
        # ìƒíƒœ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        for name, data in current_data.items():
            if name in self.student_widgets:
                widget = self.student_widgets[name]
                
                if data['checked_in']:
                    # ì¶œì„í•¨
                    widget['frame'].config(bg='#1b5e20')  # ì§„í•œ ë…¹ìƒ‰
                    
                    # ì²˜ìŒ ì¶œì„í•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš°
                    if name not in self.students or not self.students[name]['checked_in']:
                        now = datetime.now()
                        self.students[name] = {
                            'checked_in': True,
                            'start_time': now,
                            'end_time': now + timedelta(minutes=self.class_minutes)
                        }
                        
                        # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
                        if data['check_time']:
                            widget['time'].config(text=data['check_time'], fg='lightgreen')
                        else:
                            widget['time'].config(text=now.strftime("%H:%M"), fg='lightgreen')
                    
                    # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ê³„ì‚°
                    if name in self.students:
                        end = self.students[name]['end_time']
                        remain = end - datetime.now()
                        
                        if remain.total_seconds() > 0:
                            minutes = int(remain.total_seconds() // 60)
                            seconds = int(remain.total_seconds() % 60)
                            
                            widget['remain'].config(
                                text=f"{minutes:02d}:{seconds:02d}",
                                fg='lightgreen' if minutes > 10 else 'yellow' if minutes > 5 else 'red'
                            )
                        else:
                            # ì‹œê°„ ì¢…ë£Œ
                            widget['remain'].config(text="ì™„ë£Œ!", fg='red')
                            widget['frame'].config(bg='#b71c1c')  # ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰
                            
                            # ì•Œë¦¼ìŒ
                            if not self.students[name].get('alerted'):
                                winsound.Beep(1000, 300)
                                self.students[name]['alerted'] = True
                else:
                    # ë¯¸ì¶œì„
                    widget['frame'].config(bg=self.card_color)
                    widget['time'].config(text="--:--", fg='gray')
                    widget['remain'].config(text="", fg='gray')
        
        # 1ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ (íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ìš©)
        if self.monitoring:
            self.root.after(1000, lambda: self.update_ui(current_data))
            
    def run(self):
        """ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", self.on_close)
        self.root.mainloop()
        
    def on_close(self):
        """ì¢…ë£Œ"""
        self.monitoring = False
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
        self.root.destroy()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = SimpleAttendanceGUI()
    app.run()

"""
ì‹¬í”Œí•œ GUI ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§
í•µì‹¬ ê¸°ëŠ¥ë§Œ êµ¬í˜„
"""
import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import ttk
import threading
import time
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import winsound
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By

class SimpleAttendanceGUI:
    def __init__(self):
        self.root = tk.Tk()
        self.root.title("ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§")
        self.root.geometry("800x600")
        
        # ë‹¤í¬ í…Œë§ˆ
        self.bg_color = '#2b2b2b'
        self.fg_color = '#ffffff'
        self.card_color = '#3c3c3c'
        
        self.root.configure(bg=self.bg_color)
        
        self.students = {}
        self.driver = None
        self.monitoring = False
        self.logged_in = False
        self.class_minutes = 120  # ê¸°ë³¸ 2ì‹œê°„
        
        self.setup_ui()
        
    def setup_ui(self):
        """UI ì„¤ì •"""
        # ì œëª©
        title = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 20, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        title.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ë²„íŠ¼ í”„ë ˆì„
        button_frame = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        button_frame.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ì‹œì‘ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.start_btn = tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="â–¶ ì‹œì‘",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#4CAF50',
            fg='white',
            command=self.start_monitoring,
            width=15,
            height=2
        )
        self.start_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ ë²„íŠ¼ (ì´ˆê¸°ì—ëŠ” ìˆ¨ê¹€)
        self.login_btn = tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="âœ“ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#2196F3',
            fg='white',
            command=self.confirm_login,
            width=15,
            height=2,
            state='disabled'
        )
        self.login_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ìƒíƒœ í‘œì‹œ
        self.status_label = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ëŒ€ê¸° ì¤‘...",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        self.status_label.pack()
        
        # ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í”„ë ˆì„
        container = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        container.pack(fill='both', expand=True, padx=20, pady=10)
        
        canvas = tk.Canvas(container, bg=self.bg_color, highlightthickness=0)
        scrollbar = ttk.Scrollbar(container, orient="vertical", command=canvas.yview)
        
        self.student_frame = tk.Frame(canvas, bg=self.bg_color)
        
        canvas.create_window((0, 0), window=self.student_frame, anchor="nw")
        canvas.configure(yscrollcommand=scrollbar.set)
        
        self.student_frame.bind(
            "<Configure>",
            lambda e: canvas.configure(scrollregion=canvas.bbox("all"))
        )
        
        canvas.pack(side="left", fill="both", expand=True)
        scrollbar.pack(side="right", fill="y")
        
        self.student_widgets = {}
        
    def start_monitoring(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.start_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.run_browser, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
        
    def run_browser(self):
        """ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.driver = webdriver.Chrome()
        self.driver.get("https://attok.co.kr/")
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ëŒ€ê¸° - GUI ë²„íŠ¼ìœ¼ë¡œ ì²˜ë¦¬
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ì—ì„œ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í›„ 'ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ' ë²„íŠ¼ì„ ëˆŒëŸ¬ì£¼ì„¸ìš”"))
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.login_btn.config(state='normal'))
    
    def confirm_login(self):
        """ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ í™•ì¸"""
        self.login_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        # ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘ì„ ë³„ë„ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.start_monitoring_loop, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
    
    def start_monitoring_loop(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ë£¨í”„ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.monitoring = True
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì¤‘..."))
        
        # ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘
        self.monitor_thread()
        
    def monitor_thread(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œ"""
        while self.monitoring:
            students = self.get_students()
            
            # UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ëŠ” ë©”ì¸ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
            self.root.after(0, self.update_ui, students)
            
            time.sleep(10)
            
    def get_students(self):
        """í•™ìƒ ì •ë³´ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
        result = {}
        
        try:
            ul_elements = self.driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "ul")
            
            for ul in ul_elements:
                li_items = ul.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "li")
                
                if 70 <= len(li_items) <= 90:
                    for li in li_items:
                        strong_tags = li.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "strong")
                        
                        if not strong_tags or not any("ë°°ê²½" in s.text for s in strong_tags):
                            text = li.text.strip()
                            if text:
                                lines = text.split('\n')
                                name = lines[0].strip()
                                
                                # ì¶œì„ í™•ì¸
                                checked_in = False
                                check_time = ""
                                
                                for line in lines[1:]:
                                    if "ë“±ì›" in line:
                                        if "ë“±ì› -" not in line:
                                            checked_in = True
                                            # ì‹œê°„ ì¶”ì¶œ ì‹œë„
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                        break
                                
                                result[name] = {
                                    'checked_in': checked_in,
                                    'check_time': check_time
                                }
                    break
        except:
            pass
            
        return result
        
    def update_ui(self, current_data):
        """UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸"""
        # ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒë§Œ í•„í„°ë§
        checked_in_students = {name: data for name, data in current_data.items() 
                              if data.get('checked_in', False)}
        
        # ìƒˆë¡œ ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒ ìœ„ì ¯ ìƒì„±
        for name in checked_in_students:
            if name not in self.student_widgets:
                # í˜„ì¬ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ ìœ„ì¹˜ ê³„ì‚°
                row = len(self.student_widgets) // 2
                col = len(self.student_widgets) % 2
                
                frame = tk.Frame(
                    self.student_frame,
                    bg='#1b5e20',  # ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒì€ ë…¹ìƒ‰ ë°°ê²½
                    relief=tk.RAISED,
                    borderwidth=1
                )
                frame.grid(row=row, column=col, padx=5, pady=5, sticky='ew')
                
                # ì´ë¦„
                name_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text=name[:15],  # ì´ë¦„ ê¸¸ì´ ì¡°ê¸ˆ ëŠ˜ë¦¼
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 11, 'bold'),
                    bg='#1b5e20',
                    fg=self.fg_color,
                    width=15
                )
                name_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„
                time_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 10),
                    bg='#1b5e20',
                    fg='lightgreen',
                    width=10
                )
                time_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„
                remain_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14, 'bold'),
                    bg='#1b5e20',
                    fg='lightgreen',
                    width=15
                )
                remain_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                self.student_widgets[name] = {
                    'frame': frame,
                    'time': time_label,
                    'remain': remain_label
                }
        
        # ìƒíƒœ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        for name, data in current_data.items():
            if name in self.student_widgets:
                widget = self.student_widgets[name]
                
                if data['checked_in']:
                    # ì¶œì„í•¨
                    widget['frame'].config(bg='#1b5e20')  # ì§„í•œ ë…¹ìƒ‰
                    
                    # ì²˜ìŒ ì¶œì„í•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš°
                    if name not in self.students or not self.students[name]['checked_in']:
                        now = datetime.now()
                        self.students[name] = {
                            'checked_in': True,
                            'start_time': now,
                            'end_time': now + timedelta(minutes=self.class_minutes)
                        }
                        
                        # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
                        if data['check_time']:
                            widget['time'].config(text=data['check_time'], fg='lightgreen')
                        else:
                            widget['time'].config(text=now.strftime("%H:%M"), fg='lightgreen')
                    
                    # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ê³„ì‚°
                    if name in self.students:
                        end = self.students[name]['end_time']
                        remain = end - datetime.now()
                        
                        if remain.total_seconds() > 0:
                            minutes = int(remain.total_seconds() // 60)
                            seconds = int(remain.total_seconds() % 60)
                            
                            widget['remain'].config(
                                text=f"{minutes:02d}:{seconds:02d}",
                                fg='lightgreen' if minutes > 10 else 'yellow' if minutes > 5 else 'red'
                            )
                        else:
                            # ì‹œê°„ ì¢…ë£Œ
                            widget['remain'].config(text="ì™„ë£Œ!", fg='red')
                            widget['frame'].config(bg='#b71c1c')  # ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰
                            
                            # ì•Œë¦¼ìŒ
                            if not self.students[name].get('alerted'):
                                winsound.Beep(1000, 300)
                                self.students[name]['alerted'] = True
                else:
                    # ë¯¸ì¶œì„
                    widget['frame'].config(bg=self.card_color)
                    widget['time'].config(text="--:--", fg='gray')
                    widget['remain'].config(text="", fg='gray')
        
        # 1ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ (íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ìš©)
        if self.monitoring:
            self.root.after(1000, lambda: self.update_ui(current_data))
            
    def run(self):
        """ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", self.on_close)
        self.root.mainloop()
        
    def on_close(self):
        """ì¢…ë£Œ"""
        self.monitoring = False
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
        self.root.destroy()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = SimpleAttendanceGUI()
    app.run()

        for name in checked_in_students:

                # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„

                }
        
        # ìƒíƒœ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ - ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒë§Œ
        for name in checked_in_students:
            if name in self.student_widgets:
                widget = self.student_widgets[name]
                data = checked_in_students[name]
                
                # ì²˜ìŒ ì¶œì„í•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš° ì‹œê°„ ê¸°ë¡
                if name not in self.students or not self.students[name].get('checked_in'):
                    now = datetime.now()
                    self.students[name] = {
                        'checked_in': True,
                        'start_time': now,
                        'end_time': now + timedelta(minutes=self.class_minutes)
                    }
                    
                    # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
                    if data.get('check_time'):
                        widget['time'].config(text=f"ì¶œì„: {data['check_time']}")
                    else:
                        widget['time'].config(text=f"ì¶œì„: {now.strftime('%H:%M')}")
                
                # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ê³„ì‚° ë° ìì—°ì–´ í‘œì‹œ
                if name in self.students:
                    end = self.students[name]['end_time']
                    remain = end - datetime.now()
                    
                    if remain.total_seconds() > 0:
                        total_minutes = int(remain.total_seconds() // 60)
                        
                        # ìì—°ì–´ í˜•ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ ë³€í™˜
                        if total_minutes >= 60:
                            hours = total_minutes // 60
                            minutes = total_minutes % 60
                            if minutes > 0:
                                time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„ {minutes}ë¶„"
                            else:
                                time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„"
                        else:

                        # ìƒ‰ìƒ ê²°ì •
                        if total_minutes > 30:
                            color = 'lightgreen'
                        elif total_minutes > 10:
                            color = 'yellow'
                        else:

                        widget['remain'].config(text=time_text, fg=color)
                    else:

                        widget['remain'].config(text="ìˆ˜ì—… ì™„ë£Œ!", fg='red')
                        widget['frame'].config(bg='#b71c1c')  # ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰
                        
                        # ì•Œë¦¼ìŒ
                        if not self.students[name].get('alerted'):

                            self.students[name]['alerted'] = True
        
        # 1ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ (íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ìš©)
        if self.monitoring:
            self.root.after(1000, lambda: self.update_ui(current_data))
            
    def run(self):
        """ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", self.on_close)
        self.root.mainloop()
        
    def on_close(self):
        """ì¢…ë£Œ"""
        self.monitoring = False
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
        self.root.destroy()

    app.run()

                        # ìì—°ì–´ í˜•ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ ë³€í™˜
                        if total_minutes >= 60:
                            hours = total_minutes // 60
                            minutes = total_minutes % 60
                            if minutes > 0:
                                time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„ {minutes}ë¶„"
                            else:
                                time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„"
                        else:
                            time_text = f"{total_minutes}ë¶„"
                        
                        # ìƒ‰ìƒ ê²°ì •
                        if total_minutes > 30:
                            color = 'lightgreen'
                        elif total_minutes > 10:
                            color = 'yellow'
                        else:
                            color = 'orange'
                        
                        widget['remain'].config(text=time_text, fg=color)
                    else:
                        # ì‹œê°„ ì¢…ë£Œ
                        widget['remain'].config(text="ìˆ˜ì—… ì™„ë£Œ!", fg='red')
                        widget['frame'].config(bg='#b71c1c')  # ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰
                        
                        # ì•Œë¦¼ìŒ
                        if not self.students[name].get('alerted'):
                            winsound.Beep(1000, 300)
                            self.students[name]['alerted'] = True
        
        # 1ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ (íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ìš©)
        if self.monitoring:
            self.root.after(1000, lambda: self.update_ui(current_data))
            
    def run(self):
        """ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", self.on_close)
        self.root.mainloop()
        
    def on_close(self):
        """ì¢…ë£Œ"""
        self.monitoring = False
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
        self.root.destroy()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = SimpleAttendanceGUI()
    app.run()

"""
ì‹¬í”Œí•œ GUI ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§
í•µì‹¬ ê¸°ëŠ¥ë§Œ êµ¬í˜„
"""
import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import ttk
import threading
import time
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import winsound
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By

class SimpleAttendanceGUI:
    def __init__(self):
        self.root = tk.Tk()
        self.root.title("ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§")
        self.root.geometry("800x600")
        
        # ë‹¤í¬ í…Œë§ˆ
        self.bg_color = '#2b2b2b'
        self.fg_color = '#ffffff'
        self.card_color = '#3c3c3c'
        
        self.root.configure(bg=self.bg_color)
        
        self.students = {}
        self.driver = None
        self.monitoring = False
        self.logged_in = False
        self.class_minutes = 120  # ê¸°ë³¸ 2ì‹œê°„
        
        self.setup_ui()
        
    def setup_ui(self):
        """UI ì„¤ì •"""
        # ì œëª©
        title = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 20, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        title.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ë²„íŠ¼ í”„ë ˆì„
        button_frame = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        button_frame.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ì‹œì‘ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.start_btn = tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="â–¶ ì‹œì‘",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#4CAF50',
            fg='white',
            command=self.start_monitoring,
            width=15,
            height=2
        )
        self.start_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ ë²„íŠ¼ (ì´ˆê¸°ì—ëŠ” ìˆ¨ê¹€)
        self.login_btn = tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="âœ“ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#2196F3',
            fg='white',
            command=self.confirm_login,
            width=15,
            height=2,
            state='disabled'
        )
        self.login_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ìƒíƒœ í‘œì‹œ
        self.status_label = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ëŒ€ê¸° ì¤‘...",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        self.status_label.pack()
        
        # ì¶œì„ ì¸ì› í‘œì‹œ
        self.count_label = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ì¶œì„: 0ëª…",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg='#4CAF50'
        )
        self.count_label.pack()
        
        # ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í”„ë ˆì„
        container = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        container.pack(fill='both', expand=True, padx=20, pady=10)
        
        canvas = tk.Canvas(container, bg=self.bg_color, highlightthickness=0)
        scrollbar = ttk.Scrollbar(container, orient="vertical", command=canvas.yview)
        
        self.student_frame = tk.Frame(canvas, bg=self.bg_color)
        
        canvas.create_window((0, 0), window=self.student_frame, anchor="nw")
        canvas.configure(yscrollcommand=scrollbar.set)
        
        self.student_frame.bind(
            "<Configure>",
            lambda e: canvas.configure(scrollregion=canvas.bbox("all"))
        )
        
        canvas.pack(side="left", fill="both", expand=True)
        scrollbar.pack(side="right", fill="y")
        
        self.student_widgets = {}
        
    def start_monitoring(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.start_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.run_browser, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
        
    def run_browser(self):
        """ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.driver = webdriver.Chrome()
        self.driver.get("https://attok.co.kr/")
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ëŒ€ê¸° - GUI ë²„íŠ¼ìœ¼ë¡œ ì²˜ë¦¬
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ì—ì„œ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í›„ 'ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ' ë²„íŠ¼ì„ ëˆŒëŸ¬ì£¼ì„¸ìš”"))
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.login_btn.config(state='normal'))
    
    def confirm_login(self):
        """ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ í™•ì¸"""
        self.login_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        # ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘ì„ ë³„ë„ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.start_monitoring_loop, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
    
    def start_monitoring_loop(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ë£¨í”„ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.monitoring = True
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì¤‘..."))
        
        # ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘
        self.monitor_thread()
        
    def monitor_thread(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œ"""
        while self.monitoring:
            students = self.get_students()
            
            # UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ëŠ” ë©”ì¸ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
            self.root.after(0, self.update_ui, students)
            
            time.sleep(10)
            
    def get_students(self):
        """í•™ìƒ ì •ë³´ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
        result = {}
        
        try:
            ul_elements = self.driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "ul")
            
            for ul in ul_elements:
                li_items = ul.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "li")
                
                if 70 <= len(li_items) <= 90:
                    for li in li_items:
                        strong_tags = li.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "strong")
                        
                        if not strong_tags or not any("ë°°ê²½" in s.text for s in strong_tags):
                            text = li.text.strip()
                            if text:
                                lines = text.split('\n')
                                name = lines[0].strip()
                                
                                # ì¶œì„ í™•ì¸
                                checked_in = False
                                check_time = ""
                                
                                for line in lines[1:]:
                                    if "ë“±ì›" in line:
                                        if "ë“±ì› -" not in line:
                                            checked_in = True
                                            # ì‹œê°„ ì¶”ì¶œ ì‹œë„
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                        break
                                
                                result[name] = {
                                    'checked_in': checked_in,
                                    'check_time': check_time
                                }
                    break
        except:
            pass
            
        return result
        
    def update_ui(self, current_data):
        """UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸"""
        # ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒë§Œ í•„í„°ë§
        checked_in_students = {name: data for name, data in current_data.items() 
                              if data.get('checked_in', False)}
        
        # ì¶œì„ ì¸ì› ìˆ˜ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        self.count_label.config(text=f"ì¶œì„: {len(checked_in_students)}ëª…")
        
        # ìƒˆë¡œ ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒ ìœ„ì ¯ ìƒì„±
        for name in checked_in_students:
            if name not in self.student_widgets:
                # í˜„ì¬ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ ìœ„ì¹˜ ê³„ì‚°
                row = len(self.student_widgets) // 2
                col = len(self.student_widgets) % 2
                
                frame = tk.Frame(
                    self.student_frame,
                    bg='#1b5e20',  # ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒì€ ë…¹ìƒ‰ ë°°ê²½
                    relief=tk.RAISED,
                    borderwidth=1
                )
                frame.grid(row=row, column=col, padx=5, pady=5, sticky='ew')
                
                # ì´ë¦„
                name_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text=name[:15],  # ì´ë¦„ ê¸¸ì´ ì¡°ê¸ˆ ëŠ˜ë¦¼
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 11, 'bold'),
                    bg='#1b5e20',
                    fg=self.fg_color,
                    width=15
                )
                name_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„
                time_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 10),
                    bg='#1b5e20',
                    fg='lightgreen',
                    width=10
                )
                time_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„
                remain_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14, 'bold'),
                    bg='#1b5e20',
                    fg='lightgreen',
                    width=15
                )
                remain_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                self.student_widgets[name] = {
                    'frame': frame,
                    'time': time_label,
                    'remain': remain_label
                }
        
        # ìƒíƒœ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ - ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒë§Œ
        for name in checked_in_students:
            if name in self.student_widgets:
                widget = self.student_widgets[name]
                data = checked_in_students[name]
                
                # ì²˜ìŒ ì¶œì„í•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš° ì‹œê°„ ê¸°ë¡
                if name not in self.students or not self.students[name].get('checked_in'):
                    now = datetime.now()
                    self.students[name] = {
                        'checked_in': True,
                        'start_time': now,
                        'end_time': now + timedelta(minutes=self.class_minutes)
                    }
                    
                    # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
                    if data.get('check_time'):
                        widget['time'].config(text=f"ì¶œì„: {data['check_time']}")
                    else:
                        widget['time'].config(text=f"ì¶œì„: {now.strftime('%H:%M')}")
                
                # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ê³„ì‚° ë° ìì—°ì–´ í‘œì‹œ
                if name in self.students:
                    end = self.students[name]['end_time']
                    remain = end - datetime.now()
                    
                    if remain.total_seconds() > 0:
                        total_minutes = int(remain.total_seconds() // 60)
                        
                        # ìì—°ì–´ í˜•ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ ë³€í™˜
                        if total_minutes >= 60:
                            hours = total_minutes // 60
                            minutes = total_minutes % 60
                            if minutes > 0:
                                time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„ {minutes}ë¶„"
                            else:
                                time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„"
                        else:
                            time_text = f"{total_minutes}ë¶„"
                        
                        # ìƒ‰ìƒ ê²°ì •
                        if total_minutes > 30:
                            color = 'lightgreen'
                        elif total_minutes > 10:
                            color = 'yellow'
                        else:
                            color = 'orange'
                        
                        widget['remain'].config(text=time_text, fg=color)
                    else:
                        # ì‹œê°„ ì¢…ë£Œ
                        widget['remain'].config(text="ìˆ˜ì—… ì™„ë£Œ!", fg='red')
                        widget['frame'].config(bg='#b71c1c')  # ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰
                        
                        # ì•Œë¦¼ìŒ
                        if not self.students[name].get('alerted'):
                            winsound.Beep(1000, 300)
                            self.students[name]['alerted'] = True
        
        # 1ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ (íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ìš©)
        if self.monitoring:
            self.root.after(1000, lambda: self.update_ui(current_data))
            
    def run(self):
        """ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", self.on_close)
        self.root.mainloop()
        
    def on_close(self):
        """ì¢…ë£Œ"""
        self.monitoring = False
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
        self.root.destroy()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = SimpleAttendanceGUI()
    app.run()

"""
ì‹¬í”Œí•œ GUI ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§
ì‹¤ì œ ë“±ì› ì‹œê°„ ê¸°ë°˜ ê³„ì‚°
ìˆ˜ì—… ì‹œê°„ ì¡°ì ˆ ê°€ëŠ¥
"""
import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import ttk
import threading
import time
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import winsound
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By

class SimpleAttendanceGUI:
    def __init__(self):
        self.root = tk.Tk()
        self.root.title("ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§")
        self.root.geometry("900x700")
        
        # ë‹¤í¬ í…Œë§ˆ
        self.bg_color = '#2b2b2b'
        self.fg_color = '#ffffff'
        self.card_color = '#3c3c3c'
        
        self.root.configure(bg=self.bg_color)
        
        self.students = {}
        self.driver = None
        self.monitoring = False
        self.logged_in = False
        self.class_minutes = 90  # ê¸°ë³¸ 1ì‹œê°„ 30ë¶„
        
        self.setup_ui()
        
    def setup_ui(self):
        """UI ì„¤ì •"""
        # ì œëª©
        title = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 20, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        title.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ë²„íŠ¼ í”„ë ˆì„
        button_frame = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        button_frame.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ì‹œì‘ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.start_btn = tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="â–¶ ì‹œì‘",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#4CAF50',
            fg='white',
            command=self.start_monitoring,
            width=15,
            height=2
        )
        self.start_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.login_btn = tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="âœ“ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#2196F3',
            fg='white',
            command=self.confirm_login,
            width=15,
            height=2,
            state='disabled'
        )
        self.login_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ìƒíƒœ í‘œì‹œ
        self.status_label = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ëŒ€ê¸° ì¤‘...",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        self.status_label.pack()
        
        # ì¶œì„ ì¸ì› í‘œì‹œ
        self.count_label = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ì¶œì„: 0ëª…",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg='#4CAF50'
        )
        self.count_label.pack()
        
        # ìˆ˜ì—… ì‹œê°„ ì¡°ì ˆ í”„ë ˆì„
        time_adjust_frame = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        time_adjust_frame.pack(pady=5)
        
        tk.Button(
            time_adjust_frame,
            text="-10ë¶„",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 10),
            bg='#FF5722',
            fg='white',
            command=lambda: self.adjust_class_time(-10),
            width=8
        ).pack(side='left', padx=2)
        
        self.time_label = tk.Label(
            time_adjust_frame,
            text="ìˆ˜ì—…ì‹œê°„: 1ì‹œê°„ 30ë¶„",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 11),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        self.time_label.pack(side='left', padx=10)
        
        tk.Button(
            time_adjust_frame,
            text="+10ë¶„",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 10),
            bg='#2196F3',
            fg='white',
            command=lambda: self.adjust_class_time(10),
            width=8
        ).pack(side='left', padx=2)
        
        # ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í”„ë ˆì„
        container = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        container.pack(fill='both', expand=True, padx=20, pady=10)
        
        canvas = tk.Canvas(container, bg=self.bg_color, highlightthickness=0)
        scrollbar = ttk.Scrollbar(container, orient="vertical", command=canvas.yview)
        
        self.student_frame = tk.Frame(canvas, bg=self.bg_color)
        
        canvas.create_window((0, 0), window=self.student_frame, anchor="nw")
        canvas.configure(yscrollcommand=scrollbar.set)
        
        self.student_frame.bind(
            "<Configure>",
            lambda e: canvas.configure(scrollregion=canvas.bbox("all"))
        )
        
        canvas.pack(side="left", fill="both", expand=True)
        scrollbar.pack(side="right", fill="y")
        
        self.student_widgets = {}
    
    def parse_time(self, time_str):
        """ì‹œê°„ ë¬¸ìì—´ íŒŒì‹± (ì˜¤ì „/ì˜¤í›„ í¬í•¨)"""
        if not time_str:
            return None
        
        try:
            # "ì˜¤ì „ 10:30" ë˜ëŠ” "ì˜¤í›„ 2:30" í˜•ì‹
            time_str = time_str.strip()
            is_pm = "ì˜¤í›„" in time_str
            
            # ìˆ«ìë§Œ ì¶”ì¶œ
            time_part = time_str.replace("ì˜¤ì „", "").replace("ì˜¤í›„", "").strip()
            if ":" in time_part:
                hour, minute = time_part.split(":")
                hour = int(hour)
                minute = int(minute)
                
                if is_pm and hour != 12:
                    hour += 12
                elif not is_pm and hour == 12:
                    hour = 0
                
                today = datetime.now().date()
                return datetime.combine(today, datetime.min.time().replace(hour=hour, minute=minute))
        except:
            pass
        
        return None
    
    def adjust_class_time(self, minutes):
        """ìˆ˜ì—… ì‹œê°„ ì¡°ì ˆ"""
        self.class_minutes += minutes
        if self.class_minutes < 30:  # ìµœì†Œ 30ë¶„
            self.class_minutes = 30
        elif self.class_minutes > 240:  # ìµœëŒ€ 4ì‹œê°„
            self.class_minutes = 240
        
        # ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        hours = self.class_minutes // 60
        mins = self.class_minutes % 60
        if hours > 0 and mins > 0:
            time_text = f"ìˆ˜ì—…ì‹œê°„: {hours}ì‹œê°„ {mins}ë¶„"
        elif hours > 0:
            time_text = f"ìˆ˜ì—…ì‹œê°„: {hours}ì‹œê°„"
        else:
            time_text = f"ìˆ˜ì—…ì‹œê°„: {mins}ë¶„"
        
        self.time_label.config(text=time_text)
        
        # ê¸°ì¡´ í•™ìƒë“¤ì˜ ì¢…ë£Œ ì‹œê°„ ì¬ê³„ì‚°
        for name in self.students:
            if 'actual_check_in_time' in self.students[name]:
                check_in = self.students[name]['actual_check_in_time']
                self.students[name]['end_time'] = check_in + timedelta(minutes=self.class_minutes)
        
    def start_monitoring(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.start_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.run_browser, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
        
    def run_browser(self):
        """ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.driver = webdriver.Chrome()
        self.driver.get("https://attok.co.kr/")
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ëŒ€ê¸° - GUI ë²„íŠ¼ìœ¼ë¡œ ì²˜ë¦¬
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ì—ì„œ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í›„ 'ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ' ë²„íŠ¼ì„ ëˆŒëŸ¬ì£¼ì„¸ìš”"))
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.login_btn.config(state='normal'))
    
    def confirm_login(self):
        """ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ í™•ì¸"""
        self.login_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        # ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘ì„ ë³„ë„ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.start_monitoring_loop, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
    
    def start_monitoring_loop(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ë£¨í”„ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.monitoring = True
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì¤‘..."))
        
        # ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘
        self.monitor_thread()
        
    def monitor_thread(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œ"""
        while self.monitoring:
            students = self.get_students()
            
            # UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ëŠ” ë©”ì¸ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
            self.root.after(0, self.update_ui, students)
            
            time.sleep(10)
            
    def get_students(self):
        """í•™ìƒ ì •ë³´ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
        result = {}
        
        try:
            ul_elements = self.driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "ul")
            
            for ul in ul_elements:
                li_items = ul.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "li")
                
                if 70 <= len(li_items) <= 90:
                    for li in li_items:
                        strong_tags = li.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "strong")
                        
                        if not strong_tags or not any("ë°°ê²½" in s.text for s in strong_tags):
                            text = li.text.strip()
                            if text:
                                lines = text.split('\n')
                                name = lines[0].strip()
                                
                                # ì¶œì„/í•˜ì› í™•ì¸
                                checked_in = False
                                checked_out = False
                                check_in_time = ""
                                check_out_time = ""
                                
                                for line in lines[1:]:
                                    if "ë“±ì›" in line:
                                        if "ë“±ì› -" not in line and "ë“±ì›(" in line:
                                            checked_in = True
                                            # ì‹œê°„ ì¶”ì¶œ (ì˜¤ì „/ì˜¤í›„ í¬í•¨)
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_in_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                    if "í•˜ì›" in line:
                                        if "í•˜ì› -" not in line and "í•˜ì›(" in line:
                                            checked_out = True
                                            # í•˜ì› ì‹œê°„ ì¶”ì¶œ
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_out_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                
                                result[name] = {
                                    'checked_in': checked_in,
                                    'checked_out': checked_out,
                                    'check_in_time': check_in_time,
                                    'check_out_time': check_out_time
                                }
                    break
        except:
            pass
            
        return result
        
    def update_ui(self, current_data):
        """UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸"""
        # ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒë§Œ í•„í„°ë§
        checked_in_students = {name: data for name, data in current_data.items() 
                              if data.get('checked_in', False)}
        
        # ì¶œì„ ì¸ì› ìˆ˜ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        self.count_label.config(text=f"ì¶œì„: {len(checked_in_students)}ëª…")
        
        # ìƒˆë¡œ ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒ ìœ„ì ¯ ìƒì„±
        for name in checked_in_students:
            if name not in self.student_widgets:
                # í˜„ì¬ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ ìœ„ì¹˜ ê³„ì‚°
                row = len(self.student_widgets) // 2
                col = len(self.student_widgets) % 2
                
                frame = tk.Frame(
                    self.student_frame,
                    bg='#1b5e20',  # ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒì€ ë…¹ìƒ‰ ë°°ê²½
                    relief=tk.RAISED,
                    borderwidth=1
                )
                frame.grid(row=row, column=col, padx=5, pady=5, sticky='ew')
                
                # ì´ë¦„
                name_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text=name[:15],  # ì´ë¦„ ê¸¸ì´ ì¡°ê¸ˆ ëŠ˜ë¦¼
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 11, 'bold'),
                    bg='#1b5e20',
                    fg=self.fg_color,
                    width=15
                )
                name_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„
                time_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 10),
                    bg='#1b5e20',
                    fg='lightgreen',
                    width=10
                )
                time_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„
                remain_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14, 'bold'),
                    bg='#1b5e20',
                    fg='lightgreen',
                    width=20
                )
                remain_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                self.student_widgets[name] = {
                    'frame': frame,
                    'time': time_label,
                    'remain': remain_label
                }
        
        # ìƒíƒœ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ - ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒë§Œ
        for name in checked_in_students:
            if name in self.student_widgets:
                widget = self.student_widgets[name]
                data = checked_in_students[name]
                
                # ì²˜ìŒ ì¶œì„í•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš° ì‹œê°„ ê¸°ë¡
                if name not in self.students or not self.students[name].get('checked_in'):
                    # ì‹¤ì œ ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ íŒŒì‹±
                    actual_check_in = self.parse_time(data.get('check_in_time', ''))
                    if actual_check_in is None:
                        actual_check_in = datetime.now()
                    
                    self.students[name] = {
                        'checked_in': True,
                        'actual_check_in_time': actual_check_in,
                        'end_time': actual_check_in + timedelta(minutes=self.class_minutes),
                        'checked_out': data.get('checked_out', False),
                        'check_out_time': data.get('check_out_time', '')
                    }
                    
                    # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
                    widget['time'].config(text=f"ì¶œì„: {actual_check_in.strftime('%H:%M')}")
                
                # í•˜ì› ì—¬ë¶€ ë° ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ì²˜ë¦¬
                if name in self.students:
                    student_info = self.students[name]
                    
                    # í•˜ì› ìƒíƒœ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
                    if data.get('checked_out') and not student_info.get('checked_out'):
                        student_info['checked_out'] = True
                        student_info['check_out_time'] = data.get('check_out_time', '')
                    
                    # ì´ë¯¸ í•˜ì›í•œ ê²½ìš°
                    if student_info.get('checked_out'):
                        # ìˆ˜ì—… ì‹œê°„ ê³„ì‚°
                        check_in = student_info['actual_check_in_time']
                        check_out_time = self.parse_time(student_info.get('check_out_time', ''))
                        if check_out_time:
                            duration = check_out_time - check_in
                            total_mins = int(duration.total_seconds() // 60)
                            hours = total_mins // 60
                            mins = total_mins % 60
                            
                            if hours > 0 and mins > 0:
                                duration_text = f"í•˜ì› ({hours}ì‹œê°„ {mins}ë¶„ ìˆ˜ì—…)"
                            elif hours > 0:
                                duration_text = f"í•˜ì› ({hours}ì‹œê°„ ìˆ˜ì—…)"
                            else:
                                duration_text = f"í•˜ì› ({mins}ë¶„ ìˆ˜ì—…)"
                        else:
                            duration_text = "í•˜ì›"
                        
                        widget['remain'].config(text=duration_text, fg='gray')
                        widget['frame'].config(bg='#424242')  # íšŒìƒ‰
                    else:
                        # í˜„ì¬ ìˆ˜ì—… ì¤‘
                        end = student_info['end_time']
                        remain = end - datetime.now()
                        
                        if remain.total_seconds() > 0:
                            total_minutes = int(remain.total_seconds() // 60)
                            
                            # ìì—°ì–´ í˜•ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ ë³€í™˜
                            if total_minutes >= 60:
                                hours = total_minutes // 60
                                minutes = total_minutes % 60
                                if minutes > 0:
                                    time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„ {minutes}ë¶„"
                                else:
                                    time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„"
                            else:
                                time_text = f"{total_minutes}ë¶„"
                            
                            # ìƒ‰ìƒ ê²°ì •
                            if total_minutes > 30:
                                color = 'lightgreen'
                            elif total_minutes > 10:
                                color = 'yellow'
                            else:
                                color = 'orange'
                            
                            widget['remain'].config(text=time_text, fg=color)
                        else:
                            # ì‹œê°„ ì´ˆê³¼ (í•˜ì› í•´ì•¼ í•¨)
                            over_minutes = int((-remain.total_seconds()) // 60)
                            widget['remain'].config(text=f"í•˜ì› ì˜ˆì • ({over_minutes}ë¶„ ì´ˆê³¼)", fg='red')
                            widget['frame'].config(bg='#b71c1c')  # ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰
                            
                            # ì•Œë¦¼ìŒ
                            if not student_info.get('alerted'):
                                winsound.Beep(1000, 300)
                                self.students[name]['alerted'] = True
        
        # 1ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ (íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ìš©)
        if self.monitoring:
            self.root.after(1000, lambda: self.update_ui(current_data))
            
    def run(self):
        """ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", self.on_close)
        self.root.mainloop()
        
    def on_close(self):
        """ì¢…ë£Œ"""
        self.monitoring = False
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
        self.root.destroy()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = SimpleAttendanceGUI()
    app.run()

    def parse_time(self, time_str):
        """ì‹œê°„ ë¬¸ìì—´ íŒŒì‹± (ì˜¤ì „/ì˜¤í›„ í¬í•¨)"""
        if not time_str:

        try:

    def adjust_class_time(self, minutes):

        hours = self.class_minutes // 60

        if hours > 0 and mins > 0:
            time_text = f"ìˆ˜ì—…ì‹œê°„: {hours}ì‹œê°„ {mins}ë¶„"
        elif hours > 0:
            time_text = f"ìˆ˜ì—…ì‹œê°„: {hours}ì‹œê°„"
        else:
            time_text = f"ìˆ˜ì—…ì‹œê°„: {mins}ë¶„"
        
        self.time_label.config(text=time_text)
        
        # ê¸°ì¡´ í•™ìƒë“¤ì˜ ì¢…ë£Œ ì‹œê°„ ì¬ê³„ì‚°
        for name in self.students:
            if 'actual_check_in_time' in self.students[name]:
                check_in = self.students[name]['actual_check_in_time']
                self.students[name]['end_time'] = check_in + timedelta(minutes=self.class_minutes)
        
    def start_monitoring(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.start_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.run_browser, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
        
    def run_browser(self):
        """ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.driver = webdriver.Chrome()
        self.driver.get("https://attok.co.kr/")
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ëŒ€ê¸° - GUI ë²„íŠ¼ìœ¼ë¡œ ì²˜ë¦¬
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ì—ì„œ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í›„ 'ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ' ë²„íŠ¼ì„ ëˆŒëŸ¬ì£¼ì„¸ìš”"))
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.login_btn.config(state='normal'))
    
    def confirm_login(self):
        """ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ í™•ì¸"""
        self.login_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        # ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘ì„ ë³„ë„ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.start_monitoring_loop, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
    
    def start_monitoring_loop(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ë£¨í”„ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.monitoring = True
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì¤‘..."))
        
        # ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘
        self.monitor_thread()
        
    def monitor_thread(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œ"""
        while self.monitoring:
            students = self.get_students()
            
            # UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ëŠ” ë©”ì¸ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
            self.root.after(0, self.update_ui, students)
            
            time.sleep(10)
            
    def get_students(self):
        """í•™ìƒ ì •ë³´ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
        result = {}
        
        try:
            ul_elements = self.driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "ul")
            
            for ul in ul_elements:
                li_items = ul.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "li")
                
                if 70 <= len(li_items) <= 90:
                    for li in li_items:
                        strong_tags = li.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "strong")
                        
                        if not strong_tags or not any("ë°°ê²½" in s.text for s in strong_tags):
                            text = li.text.strip()
                            if text:
                                lines = text.split('\n')
                                name = lines[0].strip()
                                
                                # ì¶œì„/í•˜ì› í™•ì¸
                                checked_in = False
                                checked_out = False
                                check_in_time = ""
                                check_out_time = ""
                                
                                for line in lines[1:]:
                                    if "ë“±ì›" in line:
                                        if "ë“±ì› -" not in line and "ë“±ì›(" in line:
                                            checked_in = True
                                            # ì‹œê°„ ì¶”ì¶œ (ì˜¤ì „/ì˜¤í›„ í¬í•¨)
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_in_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                    if "í•˜ì›" in line:
                                        if "í•˜ì› -" not in line and "í•˜ì›(" in line:
                                            checked_out = True
                                            # í•˜ì› ì‹œê°„ ì¶”ì¶œ
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_out_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                
                                result[name] = {
                                    'checked_in': checked_in,
                                    'checked_out': checked_out,
                                    'check_in_time': check_in_time,
                                    'check_out_time': check_out_time
                                }
                    break
        except:
            pass
            
        return result
        
    def update_ui(self, current_data):
        """UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸"""
        # ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒë§Œ í•„í„°ë§
        checked_in_students = {name: data for name, data in current_data.items() 
                              if data.get('checked_in', False)}
        
        # ì¶œì„ ì¸ì› ìˆ˜ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        self.count_label.config(text=f"ì¶œì„: {len(checked_in_students)}ëª…")
        
        # ìƒˆë¡œ ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒ ìœ„ì ¯ ìƒì„±
        for name in checked_in_students:
            if name not in self.student_widgets:
                # í˜„ì¬ ê·¸ë¦¬ë“œ ìœ„ì¹˜ ê³„ì‚°
                row = len(self.student_widgets) // 2
                col = len(self.student_widgets) % 2
                
                frame = tk.Frame(
                    self.student_frame,
                    bg='#1b5e20',  # ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒì€ ë…¹ìƒ‰ ë°°ê²½
                    relief=tk.RAISED,
                    borderwidth=1
                )
                frame.grid(row=row, column=col, padx=5, pady=5, sticky='ew')
                
                # ì´ë¦„
                name_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text=name[:15],  # ì´ë¦„ ê¸¸ì´ ì¡°ê¸ˆ ëŠ˜ë¦¼
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 11, 'bold'),
                    bg='#1b5e20',
                    fg=self.fg_color,
                    width=15
                )
                name_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„
                time_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 10),
                    bg='#1b5e20',
                    fg='lightgreen',
                    width=10
                )
                time_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„
                remain_label = tk.Label(
                    frame,
                    text="",
                    font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14, 'bold'),
                    bg='#1b5e20',
                    fg='lightgreen',
                    width=20
                )
                remain_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
                
                self.student_widgets[name] = {
                    'frame': frame,
                    'time': time_label,
                    'remain': remain_label
                }
        
        # ìƒíƒœ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ - ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒë§Œ
        for name in checked_in_students:
            if name in self.student_widgets:
                widget = self.student_widgets[name]
                data = checked_in_students[name]
                
                # ì²˜ìŒ ì¶œì„í•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš° ì‹œê°„ ê¸°ë¡
                if name not in self.students or not self.students[name].get('checked_in'):
                    # ì‹¤ì œ ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ íŒŒì‹±
                    actual_check_in = self.parse_time(data.get('check_in_time', ''))
                    if actual_check_in is None:
                        actual_check_in = datetime.now()
                    
                    self.students[name] = {
                        'checked_in': True,
                        'actual_check_in_time': actual_check_in,
                        'end_time': actual_check_in + timedelta(minutes=self.class_minutes),
                        'checked_out': data.get('checked_out', False),
                        'check_out_time': data.get('check_out_time', '')
                    }
                    
                    # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
                    widget['time'].config(text=f"ì¶œì„: {actual_check_in.strftime('%H:%M')}")
                
                # í•˜ì› ì—¬ë¶€ ë° ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ì²˜ë¦¬
                if name in self.students:
                    student_info = self.students[name]
                    
                    # í•˜ì› ìƒíƒœ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
                    if data.get('checked_out') and not student_info.get('checked_out'):
                        student_info['checked_out'] = True
                        student_info['check_out_time'] = data.get('check_out_time', '')
                    
                    # ì´ë¯¸ í•˜ì›í•œ ê²½ìš°
                    if student_info.get('checked_out'):
                        # ìˆ˜ì—… ì‹œê°„ ê³„ì‚°
                        check_in = student_info['actual_check_in_time']
                        check_out_time = self.parse_time(student_info.get('check_out_time', ''))
                        if check_out_time:
                            duration = check_out_time - check_in
                            total_mins = int(duration.total_seconds() // 60)
                            hours = total_mins // 60
                            mins = total_mins % 60
                            
                            if hours > 0 and mins > 0:
                                duration_text = f"í•˜ì› ({hours}ì‹œê°„ {mins}ë¶„ ìˆ˜ì—…)"
                            elif hours > 0:
                                duration_text = f"í•˜ì› ({hours}ì‹œê°„ ìˆ˜ì—…)"
                            else:
                                duration_text = f"í•˜ì› ({mins}ë¶„ ìˆ˜ì—…)"
                        else:
                            duration_text = "í•˜ì›"
                        
                        widget['remain'].config(text=duration_text, fg='gray')
                        widget['frame'].config(bg='#424242')  # íšŒìƒ‰
                    else:
                        # í˜„ì¬ ìˆ˜ì—… ì¤‘
                        end = student_info['end_time']
                        remain = end - datetime.now()
                        
                        if remain.total_seconds() > 0:
                            total_minutes = int(remain.total_seconds() // 60)
                            
                            # ìì—°ì–´ í˜•ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ ë³€í™˜
                            if total_minutes >= 60:
                                hours = total_minutes // 60
                                minutes = total_minutes % 60
                                if minutes > 0:
                                    time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„ {minutes}ë¶„"
                                else:
                                    time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„"
                            else:
                                time_text = f"{total_minutes}ë¶„"
                            
                            # ìƒ‰ìƒ ê²°ì •
                            if total_minutes > 30:
                                color = 'lightgreen'
                            elif total_minutes > 10:
                                color = 'yellow'
                            else:
                                color = 'orange'
                            
                            widget['remain'].config(text=time_text, fg=color)
                        else:
                            # ì‹œê°„ ì´ˆê³¼ (í•˜ì› í•´ì•¼ í•¨)
                            over_minutes = int((-remain.total_seconds()) // 60)
                            widget['remain'].config(text=f"í•˜ì› ì˜ˆì • ({over_minutes}ë¶„ ì´ˆê³¼)", fg='red')
                            widget['frame'].config(bg='#b71c1c')  # ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰
                            
                            # ì•Œë¦¼ìŒ
                            if not student_info.get('alerted'):
                                winsound.Beep(1000, 300)
                                self.students[name]['alerted'] = True
        
        # 1ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ (íƒ€ì´ë¨¸ìš©)
        if self.monitoring:
            self.root.after(1000, lambda: self.update_ui(current_data))
            
    def run(self):
        """ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", self.on_close)
        self.root.mainloop()
        
    def on_close(self):
        """ì¢…ë£Œ"""
        self.monitoring = False
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
        self.root.destroy()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = SimpleAttendanceGUI()
    app.run()
