"""
ê³ ê¸‰ GUI ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§
ê°œë³„ ì‹œê°„ ì¡°ì ˆ, ì •ë ¬, í•˜ì› í‘œì‹œ
"""
import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import ttk
import threading
import time
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import winsound
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By

class AdvancedAttendanceGUI:
    def __init__(self):
        self.root = tk.Tk()
        self.root.title("ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ")
        self.root.geometry("1000x700")
        
        # ë‹¤í¬ í…Œë§ˆ
        self.bg_color = '#2b2b2b'
        self.fg_color = '#ffffff'
        self.card_color = '#3c3c3c'
        
        self.root.configure(bg=self.bg_color)
        
        self.students = {}
        self.driver = None
        self.monitoring = False
        self.logged_in = False
        self.default_class_minutes = 90  # ê¸°ë³¸ 1ì‹œê°„ 30ë¶„
        
        self.setup_ui()
        
    def setup_ui(self):
        """UI ì„¤ì •"""
        # ì œëª©
        title = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 20, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        title.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ë²„íŠ¼ í”„ë ˆì„
        button_frame = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        button_frame.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ì‹œì‘ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.start_btn = tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="â–¶ ì‹œì‘",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#4CAF50',
            fg='white',
            command=self.start_monitoring,
            width=15,
            height=2
        )
        self.start_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.login_btn = tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="âœ“ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#2196F3',
            fg='white',
            command=self.confirm_login,
            width=15,
            height=2,
            state='disabled'
        )
        self.login_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ìƒíƒœ í‘œì‹œ
        self.status_label = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ëŒ€ê¸° ì¤‘...",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        self.status_label.pack()
        
        # í†µê³„ í”„ë ˆì„
        stats_frame = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        stats_frame.pack(pady=5)
        
        self.count_label = tk.Label(
            stats_frame,
            text="ì¶œì„: 0ëª…",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg='#4CAF50'
        )
        self.count_label.pack(side='left', padx=10)
        
        self.departed_label = tk.Label(
            stats_frame,
            text="í•˜ì›: 0ëª…",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg='#9E9E9E'
        )
        self.departed_label.pack(side='left', padx=10)
        
        # ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í”„ë ˆì„
        container = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        container.pack(fill='both', expand=True, padx=20, pady=10)
        
        canvas = tk.Canvas(container, bg=self.bg_color, highlightthickness=0)
        scrollbar = ttk.Scrollbar(container, orient="vertical", command=canvas.yview)
        
        self.student_frame = tk.Frame(canvas, bg=self.bg_color)
        
        canvas.create_window((0, 0), window=self.student_frame, anchor="nw")
        canvas.configure(yscrollcommand=scrollbar.set)
        
        self.student_frame.bind(
            "<Configure>",
            lambda e: canvas.configure(scrollregion=canvas.bbox("all"))
        )
        
        canvas.pack(side="left", fill="both", expand=True)
        scrollbar.pack(side="right", fill="y")
        
        self.student_widgets = {}
        self.current_data = {}
    
    def parse_time(self, time_str):
        """ì‹œê°„ ë¬¸ìì—´ íŒŒì‹± (ì˜¤ì „/ì˜¤í›„ í¬í•¨)"""
        if not time_str:
            return None
        
        try:
            time_str = time_str.strip()
            is_pm = "ì˜¤í›„" in time_str
            
            time_part = time_str.replace("ì˜¤ì „", "").replace("ì˜¤í›„", "").strip()
            if ":" in time_part:
                hour, minute = time_part.split(":")
                hour = int(hour)
                minute = int(minute)
                
                if is_pm and hour != 12:
                    hour += 12
                elif not is_pm and hour == 12:
                    hour = 0
                
                today = datetime.now().date()
                return datetime.combine(today, datetime.min.time().replace(hour=hour, minute=minute))
        except:
            pass
        
        return None
    
    def adjust_student_time(self, name, minutes):
        """ê°œë³„ í•™ìƒ ìˆ˜ì—… ì‹œê°„ ì¡°ì ˆ"""
        if name in self.students:
            student = self.students[name]
            current_minutes = student.get('class_minutes', self.default_class_minutes)
            new_minutes = current_minutes + minutes
            
            # ì œí•œ ì„¤ì •
            if new_minutes < 30:
                new_minutes = 30
            elif new_minutes > 240:
                new_minutes = 240
            
            student['class_minutes'] = new_minutes
            student['end_time'] = student['actual_check_in_time'] + timedelta(minutes=new_minutes)
            
            # ì¦‰ì‹œ UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
            self.update_ui(self.current_data)
        
    def start_monitoring(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.start_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.run_browser, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
        
    def run_browser(self):
        """ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.driver = webdriver.Chrome()
        self.driver.get("https://attok.co.kr/")
        
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ì—ì„œ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í›„ 'ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ' ë²„íŠ¼ì„ ëˆŒëŸ¬ì£¼ì„¸ìš”"))
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.login_btn.config(state='normal'))
    
    def confirm_login(self):
        """ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ í™•ì¸"""
        self.login_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.start_monitoring_loop, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
    
    def start_monitoring_loop(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ë£¨í”„ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.monitoring = True
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì¤‘..."))
        
        self.monitor_thread()
        
    def monitor_thread(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œ"""
        while self.monitoring:
            students = self.get_students()
            self.current_data = students
            
            # UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ëŠ” ë©”ì¸ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
            self.root.after(0, self.update_ui, students)
            
            time.sleep(10)
            
    def get_students(self):
        """í•™ìƒ ì •ë³´ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
        result = {}
        
        try:
            ul_elements = self.driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "ul")
            
            for ul in ul_elements:
                li_items = ul.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "li")
                
                if 70 <= len(li_items) <= 90:
                    for li in li_items:
                        strong_tags = li.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "strong")
                        
                        if not strong_tags or not any("ë°°ê²½" in s.text for s in strong_tags):
                            text = li.text.strip()
                            if text:
                                lines = text.split('\n')
                                name = lines[0].strip()
                                
                                checked_in = False
                                checked_out = False
                                check_in_time = ""
                                check_out_time = ""
                                
                                for line in lines[1:]:
                                    if "ë“±ì›" in line:
                                        if "ë“±ì› -" not in line and "ë“±ì›(" in line:
                                            checked_in = True
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_in_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                    if "í•˜ì›" in line:
                                        if "í•˜ì› -" not in line and "í•˜ì›(" in line:
                                            checked_out = True
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_out_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                
                                result[name] = {
                                    'checked_in': checked_in,
                                    'checked_out': checked_out,
                                    'check_in_time': check_in_time,
                                    'check_out_time': check_out_time
                                }
                    break
        except:
            pass
            
        return result
        
    def create_student_widget(self, name, data):
        """í•™ìƒ ìœ„ì ¯ ìƒì„±"""
        frame = tk.Frame(
            self.student_frame,
            bg='#1b5e20',
            relief=tk.RAISED,
            borderwidth=1,
            height=60
        )
        
        # ì´ë¦„
        name_label = tk.Label(
            frame,
            text=name[:15],
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 11, 'bold'),
            bg='#1b5e20',
            fg=self.fg_color,
            width=15
        )
        name_label.pack(side='left', padx=5, pady=5)
        
        # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„
        time_label = tk.Label(
            frame,
            text="",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 10),
            bg='#1b5e20',
            fg='lightgreen',
            width=12
        )
        time_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„
        remain_label = tk.Label(
            frame,
            text="",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14, 'bold'),
            bg='#1b5e20',
            fg='lightgreen',
            width=15
        )
        remain_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ê°œë³„ ì‹œê°„ ì¡°ì ˆ ë²„íŠ¼
        btn_frame = tk.Frame(frame, bg='#1b5e20')
        btn_frame.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        tk.Button(
            btn_frame,
            text="-10",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 8),
            bg='#F44336',
            fg='white',
            command=lambda n=name: self.adjust_student_time(n, -10),
            width=4,
            height=1
        ).pack(side='left', padx=1)
        
        tk.Button(
            btn_frame,
            text="+10",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 8),
            bg='#2196F3',
            fg='white',
            command=lambda n=name: self.adjust_student_time(n, 10),
            width=4,
            height=1
        ).pack(side='left', padx=1)
        
        return {
            'frame': frame,
            'name': name_label,
            'time': time_label,
            'remain': remain_label,
            'buttons': btn_frame
        }
        
    def update_ui(self, current_data):
        """UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸"""
        # ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒë§Œ í•„í„°ë§
        checked_in_students = {name: data for name, data in current_data.items() 
                              if data.get('checked_in', False)}
        
        # ìƒˆë¡œ ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒ ì²˜ë¦¬
        for name in checked_in_students:
            data = checked_in_students[name]
            
            # ì²˜ìŒ ë³´ëŠ” í•™ìƒì´ë©´ ì •ë³´ ì €ì¥
            if name not in self.students:
                actual_check_in = self.parse_time(data.get('check_in_time', ''))
                if actual_check_in is None:
                    actual_check_in = datetime.now()
                
                self.students[name] = {
                    'checked_in': True,
                    'actual_check_in_time': actual_check_in,
                    'class_minutes': self.default_class_minutes,
                    'end_time': actual_check_in + timedelta(minutes=self.default_class_minutes),
                    'checked_out': data.get('checked_out', False),
                    'check_out_time': data.get('check_out_time', ''),
                    'actual_check_out_time': None
                }
            
            # í•˜ì› ì •ë³´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
            if data.get('checked_out') and not self.students[name].get('checked_out'):
                self.students[name]['checked_out'] = True
                self.students[name]['check_out_time'] = data.get('check_out_time', '')
                self.students[name]['actual_check_out_time'] = self.parse_time(data.get('check_out_time', ''))
        
        # ì •ë ¬: ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ì´ ì ì€ ìˆœ (í•˜ì›í•œ í•™ìƒì€ ë’¤ë¡œ)
        sorted_students = []
        departed_students = []
        
        for name in checked_in_students:
            student_info = self.students.get(name, {})
            if student_info.get('checked_out'):
                departed_students.append(name)
            else:
                # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ê³„ì‚°
                end = student_info.get('end_time', datetime.now())
                remain = (end - datetime.now()).total_seconds()
                sorted_students.append((name, remain))
        
        # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ìˆœìœ¼ë¡œ ì •ë ¬
        sorted_students.sort(key=lambda x: x[1])
        
        # ê¸°ì¡´ ìœ„ì ¯ ì œê±°
        for widget_info in self.student_widgets.values():
            widget_info['frame'].destroy()
        self.student_widgets = {}
        
        # ìœ„ì ¯ ì¬ìƒì„± (ì •ë ¬ëœ ìˆœì„œë¡œ)
        row = 0
        
        # ìˆ˜ì—… ì¤‘ì¸ í•™ìƒë“¤
        for name, _ in sorted_students:
            if name not in self.student_widgets:
                widget = self.create_student_widget(name, checked_in_students[name])
                widget['frame'].grid(row=row, column=0, padx=5, pady=3, sticky='ew')
                self.student_widgets[name] = widget
                row += 1
        
        # í•˜ì›í•œ í•™ìƒë“¤
        for name in departed_students:
            if name not in self.student_widgets:
                widget = self.create_student_widget(name, checked_in_students[name])
                widget['frame'].grid(row=row, column=0, padx=5, pady=3, sticky='ew')
                self.student_widgets[name] = widget
                row += 1
        
        # ê° í•™ìƒ ìƒíƒœ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        for name in self.student_widgets:
            widget = self.student_widgets[name]
            student_info = self.students[name]
            
            # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
            check_in_time = student_info['actual_check_in_time']
            widget['time'].config(text=f"ë“±ì›: {check_in_time.strftime('%H:%M')}")
            
            # í•˜ì›í•œ ê²½ìš°
            if student_info.get('checked_out'):
                widget['frame'].config(bg='#616161')  # ì§„í•œ íšŒìƒ‰
                widget['name'].config(bg='#616161')
                widget['time'].config(bg='#616161', fg='#BDBDBD')
                widget['remain'].config(bg='#616161')
                widget['buttons'].config(bg='#616161')
                
                # í•˜ì› ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
                if student_info.get('actual_check_out_time'):
                    check_out = student_info['actual_check_out_time']
                    duration = check_out - check_in_time
                    total_mins = int(duration.total_seconds() // 60)
                    hours = total_mins // 60
                    mins = total_mins % 60
                    
                    out_time = check_out.strftime('%H:%M')
                    if hours > 0:
                        duration_text = f"í•˜ì› {out_time} ({hours}ì‹œê°„ {mins}ë¶„)"
                    else:
                        duration_text = f"í•˜ì› {out_time} ({mins}ë¶„)"
                else:
                    duration_text = "í•˜ì›"
                
                widget['remain'].config(text=duration_text, fg='#BDBDBD')
                
                # í•˜ì›í•œ í•™ìƒì€ ë²„íŠ¼ ìˆ¨ê¸°ê¸°
                for child in widget['buttons'].winfo_children():
                    child.config(state='disabled')
            else:
                # ìˆ˜ì—… ì¤‘ì¸ ê²½ìš°
                end = student_info['end_time']
                remain = end - datetime.now()
                
                if remain.total_seconds() > 0:
                    total_minutes = int(remain.total_seconds() // 60)
                    
                    # ì‹œê°„ í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸
                    if total_minutes >= 60:
                        hours = total_minutes // 60
                        minutes = total_minutes % 60
                        if minutes > 0:
                            time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„ {minutes}ë¶„"
                        else:
                            time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„"
                    else:
                        time_text = f"{total_minutes}ë¶„"
                    
                    # ìƒ‰ìƒ ê²°ì •
                    if total_minutes > 30:
                        bg_color = '#1b5e20'  # ì§„í•œ ë…¹ìƒ‰
                        fg_color = 'lightgreen'
                    elif total_minutes > 10:
                        bg_color = '#F57C00'  # ì£¼í™©ìƒ‰
                        fg_color = 'white'
                    else:
                        bg_color = '#E65100'  # ì§„í•œ ì£¼í™©ìƒ‰
                        fg_color = 'yellow'
                    
                    widget['frame'].config(bg=bg_color)
                    widget['name'].config(bg=bg_color)
                    widget['time'].config(bg=bg_color)
                    widget['remain'].config(bg=bg_color, text=time_text, fg=fg_color)
                    widget['buttons'].config(bg=bg_color)
                else:
                    # ì‹œê°„ ì´ˆê³¼ (ì´ë¯¸ í•˜ì›í–ˆì–´ì•¼ í•¨)
                    over_minutes = int((-remain.total_seconds()) // 60)
                    
                    widget['frame'].config(bg='#b71c1c')  # ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰
                    widget['name'].config(bg='#b71c1c')
                    widget['time'].config(bg='#b71c1c')
                    widget['remain'].config(
                        bg='#b71c1c',
                        text=f"í•˜ì› ({over_minutes}ë¶„ ì´ˆê³¼)",
                        fg='white'
                    )
                    widget['buttons'].config(bg='#b71c1c')
                    
                    # ì•Œë¦¼ìŒ
                    if not student_info.get('alerted'):
                        winsound.Beep(1000, 300)
                        self.students[name]['alerted'] = True
        
        # í†µê³„ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        active_count = len(sorted_students)
        departed_count = len(departed_students)
        self.count_label.config(text=f"ìˆ˜ì—…ì¤‘: {active_count}ëª…")
        self.departed_label.config(text=f"í•˜ì›: {departed_count}ëª…")
        
        # 1ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        if self.monitoring:
            self.root.after(1000, lambda: self.update_ui(current_data))
            
    def run(self):
        """ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", self.on_close)
        self.root.mainloop()
        
    def on_close(self):
        """ì¢…ë£Œ"""
        self.monitoring = False
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
        self.root.destroy()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = AdvancedAttendanceGUI()
    app.run()

"""
ê³ ê¸‰ GUI ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§
ê°œë³„ ì‹œê°„ ì¡°ì ˆ, ì •ë ¬, í•˜ì› í‘œì‹œ
"""
import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import ttk
import threading
import time
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import winsound
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By

class AdvancedAttendanceGUI:
    def __init__(self):
        self.root = tk.Tk()
        self.root.title("ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ")
        self.root.geometry("1000x700")
        
        # ë‹¤í¬ í…Œë§ˆ
        self.bg_color = '#2b2b2b'
        self.fg_color = '#ffffff'
        self.card_color = '#3c3c3c'
        
        self.root.configure(bg=self.bg_color)
        
        self.students = {}
        self.driver = None
        self.monitoring = False
        self.logged_in = False
        self.default_class_minutes = 90  # ê¸°ë³¸ 1ì‹œê°„ 30ë¶„
        
        self.setup_ui()
        
    def setup_ui(self):
        """UI ì„¤ì •"""
        # ì œëª©
        title = tk.Label(
            self.root,

            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        title.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ë²„íŠ¼ í”„ë ˆì„
        button_frame = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        button_frame.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ì‹œì‘ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.start_btn = tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="â–¶ ì‹œì‘",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#4CAF50',
            fg='white',
            command=self.start_monitoring,
            width=15,
            height=2
        )
        self.start_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.login_btn = tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="âœ“ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#2196F3',
            fg='white',
            command=self.confirm_login,
            width=15,
            height=2,
            state='disabled'
        )
        self.login_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ìƒíƒœ í‘œì‹œ
        self.status_label = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ëŒ€ê¸° ì¤‘...",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        self.status_label.pack()
        
        # í†µê³„ í”„ë ˆì„
        stats_frame = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        stats_frame.pack(pady=5)
        
        self.count_label = tk.Label(
            stats_frame,
            text="ì¶œì„: 0ëª…",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg='#4CAF50'
        )
        self.count_label.pack(side='left', padx=10)
        
        self.departed_label = tk.Label(
            stats_frame,
            text="í•˜ì›: 0ëª…",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg='#9E9E9E'
        )
        self.departed_label.pack(side='left', padx=10)
        
        # ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í”„ë ˆì„
        container = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        container.pack(fill='both', expand=True, padx=20, pady=10)
        
        canvas = tk.Canvas(container, bg=self.bg_color, highlightthickness=0)
        scrollbar = ttk.Scrollbar(container, orient="vertical", command=canvas.yview)
        
        self.student_frame = tk.Frame(canvas, bg=self.bg_color)
        
        canvas.create_window((0, 0), window=self.student_frame, anchor="nw")
        canvas.configure(yscrollcommand=scrollbar.set)
        
        self.student_frame.bind(
            "<Configure>",
            lambda e: canvas.configure(scrollregion=canvas.bbox("all"))
        )
        
        canvas.pack(side="left", fill="both", expand=True)
        scrollbar.pack(side="right", fill="y")
        
        self.student_widgets = {}
        self.current_data = {}
    
    def parse_time(self, time_str):
        """ì‹œê°„ ë¬¸ìì—´ íŒŒì‹± (ì˜¤ì „/ì˜¤í›„ í¬í•¨)"""
        if not time_str:
            return None
        
        try:
            time_str = time_str.strip()
            is_pm = "ì˜¤í›„" in time_str
            
            time_part = time_str.replace("ì˜¤ì „", "").replace("ì˜¤í›„", "").strip()
            if ":" in time_part:
                hour, minute = time_part.split(":")
                hour = int(hour)
                minute = int(minute)
                
                if is_pm and hour != 12:
                    hour += 12
                elif not is_pm and hour == 12:
                    hour = 0
                
                today = datetime.now().date()
                return datetime.combine(today, datetime.min.time().replace(hour=hour, minute=minute))
        except:
            pass
        
        return None
    
    def adjust_student_time(self, name, minutes):
        """ê°œë³„ í•™ìƒ ìˆ˜ì—… ì‹œê°„ ì¡°ì ˆ"""
        if name in self.students:
            student = self.students[name]
            current_minutes = student.get('class_minutes', self.default_class_minutes)
            new_minutes = current_minutes + minutes
            
            # ì œí•œ ì„¤ì •
            if new_minutes < 30:
                new_minutes = 30
            elif new_minutes > 240:
                new_minutes = 240
            
            student['class_minutes'] = new_minutes
            student['end_time'] = student['actual_check_in_time'] + timedelta(minutes=new_minutes)
            
            # ì¦‰ì‹œ UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
            self.update_ui(self.current_data)
        
    def start_monitoring(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.start_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.run_browser, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
        
    def run_browser(self):
        """ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.driver = webdriver.Chrome()
        self.driver.get("https://attok.co.kr/")
        
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ì—ì„œ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í›„ 'ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ' ë²„íŠ¼ì„ ëˆŒëŸ¬ì£¼ì„¸ìš”"))
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.login_btn.config(state='normal'))
    
    def confirm_login(self):
        """ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ í™•ì¸"""
        self.login_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.start_monitoring_loop, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
    
    def start_monitoring_loop(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ë£¨í”„ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.monitoring = True
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì¤‘..."))
        
        self.monitor_thread()
        
    def monitor_thread(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œ"""
        while self.monitoring:
            students = self.get_students()
            self.current_data = students
            
            # UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ëŠ” ë©”ì¸ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
            self.root.after(0, self.update_ui, students)
            
            time.sleep(10)
            
    def get_students(self):
        """í•™ìƒ ì •ë³´ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
        result = {}
        
        try:
            ul_elements = self.driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "ul")
            
            for ul in ul_elements:
                li_items = ul.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "li")
                
                if 70 <= len(li_items) <= 90:
                    for li in li_items:
                        strong_tags = li.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "strong")
                        
                        if not strong_tags or not any("ë°°ê²½" in s.text for s in strong_tags):
                            text = li.text.strip()
                            if text:
                                lines = text.split('\n')
                                name = lines[0].strip()
                                
                                checked_in = False
                                checked_out = False
                                check_in_time = ""
                                check_out_time = ""
                                
                                for line in lines[1:]:
                                    if "ë“±ì›" in line:
                                        if "ë“±ì› -" not in line and "ë“±ì›(" in line:
                                            checked_in = True
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_in_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                    if "í•˜ì›" in line:
                                        if "í•˜ì› -" not in line and "í•˜ì›(" in line:
                                            checked_out = True
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_out_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                
                                result[name] = {
                                    'checked_in': checked_in,
                                    'checked_out': checked_out,
                                    'check_in_time': check_in_time,
                                    'check_out_time': check_out_time
                                }
                    break
        except:
            pass
            
        return result
        
    def create_student_widget(self, name, data):
        """í•™ìƒ ìœ„ì ¯ ìƒì„±"""
        frame = tk.Frame(
            self.student_frame,
            bg='#1b5e20',
            relief=tk.RAISED,
            borderwidth=1,
            height=60
        )
        
        # ì´ë¦„
        name_label = tk.Label(
            frame,
            text=name[:15],
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 11, 'bold'),
            bg='#1b5e20',
            fg=self.fg_color,
            width=15
        )
        name_label.pack(side='left', padx=5, pady=5)
        
        # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„
        time_label = tk.Label(
            frame,
            text="",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 10),
            bg='#1b5e20',
            fg='lightgreen',
            width=12
        )
        time_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„
        remain_label = tk.Label(
            frame,
            text="",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14, 'bold'),
            bg='#1b5e20',
            fg='lightgreen',
            width=15
        )
        remain_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ê°œë³„ ì‹œê°„ ì¡°ì ˆ ë²„íŠ¼
        btn_frame = tk.Frame(frame, bg='#1b5e20')
        btn_frame.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        tk.Button(
            btn_frame,
            text="-10",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 8),
            bg='#F44336',
            fg='white',
            command=lambda n=name: self.adjust_student_time(n, -10),
            width=4,
            height=1
        ).pack(side='left', padx=1)
        
        tk.Button(
            btn_frame,
            text="+10",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 8),
            bg='#2196F3',
            fg='white',
            command=lambda n=name: self.adjust_student_time(n, 10),
            width=4,
            height=1
        ).pack(side='left', padx=1)
        
        return {
            'frame': frame,
            'name': name_label,
            'time': time_label,
            'remain': remain_label,
            'buttons': btn_frame
        }
        
    def update_ui(self, current_data):
        """UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸"""
        # ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒë§Œ í•„í„°ë§
        checked_in_students = {name: data for name, data in current_data.items() 
                              if data.get('checked_in', False)}
        
        # ìƒˆë¡œ ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒ ì²˜ë¦¬
        for name in checked_in_students:
            data = checked_in_students[name]
            
            # ì²˜ìŒ ë³´ëŠ” í•™ìƒì´ë©´ ì •ë³´ ì €ì¥
            if name not in self.students:
                actual_check_in = self.parse_time(data.get('check_in_time', ''))
                if actual_check_in is None:
                    actual_check_in = datetime.now()
                
                self.students[name] = {
                    'checked_in': True,
                    'actual_check_in_time': actual_check_in,
                    'class_minutes': self.default_class_minutes,
                    'end_time': actual_check_in + timedelta(minutes=self.default_class_minutes),
                    'checked_out': data.get('checked_out', False),
                    'check_out_time': data.get('check_out_time', ''),
                    'actual_check_out_time': None
                }
            
            # í•˜ì› ì •ë³´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
            if data.get('checked_out') and not self.students[name].get('checked_out'):
                self.students[name]['checked_out'] = True
                self.students[name]['check_out_time'] = data.get('check_out_time', '')
                self.students[name]['actual_check_out_time'] = self.parse_time(data.get('check_out_time', ''))
        
        # ì •ë ¬: ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ì´ ì ì€ ìˆœ (í•˜ì›í•œ í•™ìƒì€ ë’¤ë¡œ)
        sorted_students = []
        departed_students = []
        
        for name in checked_in_students:
            student_info = self.students.get(name, {})
            if student_info.get('checked_out'):
                departed_students.append(name)
            else:
                # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ê³„ì‚°
                end = student_info.get('end_time', datetime.now())
                remain = (end - datetime.now()).total_seconds()
                sorted_students.append((name, remain))
        
        # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ìˆœìœ¼ë¡œ ì •ë ¬
        sorted_students.sort(key=lambda x: x[1])
        
        # ê¸°ì¡´ ìœ„ì ¯ ì œê±°
        for widget_info in self.student_widgets.values():
            widget_info['frame'].destroy()
        self.student_widgets = {}
        
        # ìœ„ì ¯ ì¬ìƒì„± (ì •ë ¬ëœ ìˆœì„œë¡œ)
        row = 0
        
        # ìˆ˜ì—… ì¤‘ì¸ í•™ìƒë“¤
        for name, _ in sorted_students:
            if name not in self.student_widgets:
                widget = self.create_student_widget(name, checked_in_students[name])
                widget['frame'].grid(row=row, column=0, padx=5, pady=3, sticky='ew')
                self.student_widgets[name] = widget
                row += 1
        
        # í•˜ì›í•œ í•™ìƒë“¤
        for name in departed_students:
            if name not in self.student_widgets:
                widget = self.create_student_widget(name, checked_in_students[name])
                widget['frame'].grid(row=row, column=0, padx=5, pady=3, sticky='ew')
                self.student_widgets[name] = widget
                row += 1
        
        # ê° í•™ìƒ ìƒíƒœ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        for name in self.student_widgets:
            widget = self.student_widgets[name]
            student_info = self.students[name]
            
            # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
            check_in_time = student_info['actual_check_in_time']
            widget['time'].config(text=f"ë“±ì›: {check_in_time.strftime('%H:%M')}")
            
            # í•˜ì›í•œ ê²½ìš°
            if student_info.get('checked_out'):
                widget['frame'].config(bg='#616161')  # ì§„í•œ íšŒìƒ‰
                widget['name'].config(bg='#616161')
                widget['time'].config(bg='#616161', fg='#BDBDBD')
                widget['remain'].config(bg='#616161')
                widget['buttons'].config(bg='#616161')
                
                # í•˜ì› ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
                if student_info.get('actual_check_out_time'):
                    check_out = student_info['actual_check_out_time']
                    duration = check_out - check_in_time
                    total_mins = int(duration.total_seconds() // 60)
                    hours = total_mins // 60
                    mins = total_mins % 60
                    
                    out_time = check_out.strftime('%H:%M')
                    if hours > 0:
                        duration_text = f"í•˜ì› {out_time} ({hours}ì‹œê°„ {mins}ë¶„)"
                    else:
                        duration_text = f"í•˜ì› {out_time} ({mins}ë¶„)"
                else:
                    duration_text = "í•˜ì›"
                
                widget['remain'].config(text=duration_text, fg='#BDBDBD')
                
                # í•˜ì›í•œ í•™ìƒì€ ë²„íŠ¼ ìˆ¨ê¸°ê¸°
                for child in widget['buttons'].winfo_children():
                    child.config(state='disabled')
            else:
                # ìˆ˜ì—… ì¤‘ì¸ ê²½ìš°
                end = student_info['end_time']
                remain = end - datetime.now()
                
                if remain.total_seconds() > 0:
                    total_minutes = int(remain.total_seconds() // 60)
                    
                    # ì‹œê°„ í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸
                    if total_minutes >= 60:
                        hours = total_minutes // 60
                        minutes = total_minutes % 60
                        if minutes > 0:
                            time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„ {minutes}ë¶„"
                        else:
                            time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„"
                    else:
                        time_text = f"{total_minutes}ë¶„"
                    
                    # ìƒ‰ìƒ ê²°ì •
                    if total_minutes > 30:
                        bg_color = '#1b5e20'  # ì§„í•œ ë…¹ìƒ‰
                        fg_color = 'lightgreen'
                    elif total_minutes > 10:
                        bg_color = '#F57C00'  # ì£¼í™©ìƒ‰
                        fg_color = 'white'
                    else:
                        bg_color = '#E65100'  # ì§„í•œ ì£¼í™©ìƒ‰
                        fg_color = 'yellow'
                    
                    widget['frame'].config(bg=bg_color)
                    widget['name'].config(bg=bg_color)
                    widget['time'].config(bg=bg_color)
                    widget['remain'].config(bg=bg_color, text=time_text, fg=fg_color)
                    widget['buttons'].config(bg=bg_color)
                else:
                    # ì‹œê°„ ì´ˆê³¼ (ì´ë¯¸ í•˜ì›í–ˆì–´ì•¼ í•¨)
                    over_minutes = int((-remain.total_seconds()) // 60)
                    
                    widget['frame'].config(bg='#b71c1c')  # ë¹¨ê°„ìƒ‰
                    widget['name'].config(bg='#b71c1c')
                    widget['time'].config(bg='#b71c1c')
                    widget['remain'].config(
                        bg='#b71c1c',
                        text=f"í•˜ì› ({over_minutes}ë¶„ ì´ˆê³¼)",
                        fg='white'
                    )
                    widget['buttons'].config(bg='#b71c1c')
                    
                    # ì•Œë¦¼ìŒ
                    if not student_info.get('alerted'):
                        winsound.Beep(1000, 300)
                        self.students[name]['alerted'] = True
        
        # í†µê³„ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        active_count = len(sorted_students)
        departed_count = len(departed_students)
        self.count_label.config(text=f"ìˆ˜ì—…ì¤‘: {active_count}ëª…")
        self.departed_label.config(text=f"í•˜ì›: {departed_count}ëª…")
        
        # 1ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        if self.monitoring:
            self.root.after(1000, lambda: self.update_ui(current_data))
            
    def run(self):
        """ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", self.on_close)
        self.root.mainloop()
        
    def on_close(self):
        """ì¢…ë£Œ"""
        self.monitoring = False
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
        self.root.destroy()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = AdvancedAttendanceGUI()
    app.run()

"""
ìµœì¢… GUI ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§
ê¹œë¹¡ì„ í•´ê²°, ê°œë³„ ì‹œê°„ ì¡°ì ˆ ìˆ˜ì •
"""
import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import ttk
import threading
import time
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import winsound
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By

class FinalAttendanceGUI:
    def __init__(self):
        self.root = tk.Tk()
        self.root.title("ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ")
        self.root.geometry("1000x700")
        
        # ë‹¤í¬ í…Œë§ˆ
        self.bg_color = '#2b2b2b'
        self.fg_color = '#ffffff'
        self.card_color = '#3c3c3c'
        
        self.root.configure(bg=self.bg_color)
        
        self.students = {}
        self.driver = None
        self.monitoring = False
        self.logged_in = False
        self.default_class_minutes = 90  # ê¸°ë³¸ 1ì‹œê°„ 30ë¶„
        
        self.setup_ui()
        
    def setup_ui(self):
        """UI ì„¤ì •"""
        # ì œëª©
        title = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ì¶œê²° ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œìŠ¤í…œ",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 20, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        title.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ë²„íŠ¼ í”„ë ˆì„
        button_frame = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        button_frame.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ì‹œì‘ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.start_btn = tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="â–¶ ì‹œì‘",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#4CAF50',
            fg='white',
            command=self.start_monitoring,
            width=15,
            height=2
        )
        self.start_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.login_btn = tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="âœ“ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#2196F3',
            fg='white',
            command=self.confirm_login,
            width=15,
            height=2,
            state='disabled'
        )
        self.login_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ìƒíƒœ í‘œì‹œ
        self.status_label = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ëŒ€ê¸° ì¤‘...",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        self.status_label.pack()
        
        # í†µê³„ í”„ë ˆì„
        stats_frame = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        stats_frame.pack(pady=5)
        
        self.count_label = tk.Label(
            stats_frame,
            text="ìˆ˜ì—…ì¤‘: 0ëª…",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg='#4CAF50'
        )
        self.count_label.pack(side='left', padx=10)
        
        self.departed_label = tk.Label(
            stats_frame,
            text="í•˜ì›: 0ëª…",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg='#9E9E9E'
        )
        self.departed_label.pack(side='left', padx=10)
        
        # ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í”„ë ˆì„
        container = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        container.pack(fill='both', expand=True, padx=20, pady=10)
        
        canvas = tk.Canvas(container, bg=self.bg_color, highlightthickness=0)
        scrollbar = ttk.Scrollbar(container, orient="vertical", command=canvas.yview)
        
        self.student_frame = tk.Frame(canvas, bg=self.bg_color)
        
        canvas.create_window((0, 0), window=self.student_frame, anchor="nw")
        canvas.configure(yscrollcommand=scrollbar.set)
        
        self.student_frame.bind(
            "<Configure>",
            lambda e: canvas.configure(scrollregion=canvas.bbox("all"))
        )
        
        canvas.pack(side="left", fill="both", expand=True)
        scrollbar.pack(side="right", fill="y")
        
        self.student_widgets = {}
        self.current_data = {}
        self.last_update_data = {}  # ê¹œë¹¡ì„ ë°©ì§€ìš©
    
    def parse_time(self, time_str):
        """ì‹œê°„ ë¬¸ìì—´ íŒŒì‹± (ì˜¤ì „/ì˜¤í›„ í¬í•¨)"""
        if not time_str:
            return None
        
        try:
            time_str = time_str.strip()
            is_pm = "ì˜¤í›„" in time_str
            
            time_part = time_str.replace("ì˜¤ì „", "").replace("ì˜¤í›„", "").strip()
            if ":" in time_part:
                hour, minute = time_part.split(":")
                hour = int(hour)
                minute = int(minute)
                
                if is_pm and hour != 12:
                    hour += 12
                elif not is_pm and hour == 12:
                    hour = 0
                
                today = datetime.now().date()
                return datetime.combine(today, datetime.min.time().replace(hour=hour, minute=minute))
        except:
            pass
        
        return None
    
    def adjust_student_time(self, name, minutes):
        """ê°œë³„ í•™ìƒ ìˆ˜ì—… ì‹œê°„ ì¡°ì ˆ"""
        if name in self.students:
            student = self.students[name]
            current_minutes = student.get('class_minutes', self.default_class_minutes)
            new_minutes = current_minutes + minutes
            
            # ì œí•œ ì„¤ì •
            if new_minutes < 30:
                new_minutes = 30
            elif new_minutes > 240:
                new_minutes = 240
            
            student['class_minutes'] = new_minutes
            student['end_time'] = student['actual_check_in_time'] + timedelta(minutes=new_minutes)
            
            # ìœ„ì ¯ë§Œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ (ì¬ìƒì„± í•˜ì§€ ì•ŠìŒ)
            self.update_student_widget(name)
        
    def start_monitoring(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.start_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.run_browser, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
        
    def run_browser(self):
        """ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.driver = webdriver.Chrome()
        self.driver.get("https://attok.co.kr/")
        
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ì—ì„œ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í›„ 'ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ' ë²„íŠ¼ì„ ëˆŒëŸ¬ì£¼ì„¸ìš”"))
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.login_btn.config(state='normal'))
    
    def confirm_login(self):
        """ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ í™•ì¸"""
        self.login_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.start_monitoring_loop, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
    
    def start_monitoring_loop(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ë£¨í”„ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.monitoring = True
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì¤‘..."))
        
        self.monitor_thread()
        
    def monitor_thread(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œ"""
        while self.monitoring:
            students = self.get_students()
            self.current_data = students
            
            # UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ëŠ” ë©”ì¸ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
            self.root.after(0, self.update_ui, students)
            
            time.sleep(10)
            
    def get_students(self):
        """í•™ìƒ ì •ë³´ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
        result = {}
        
        try:
            ul_elements = self.driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "ul")
            
            for ul in ul_elements:
                li_items = ul.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "li")
                
                if 70 <= len(li_items) <= 90:
                    for li in li_items:
                        strong_tags = li.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "strong")
                        
                        if not strong_tags or not any("ë°°ê²½" in s.text for s in strong_tags):
                            text = li.text.strip()
                            if text:
                                lines = text.split('\n')
                                name = lines[0].strip()
                                
                                checked_in = False
                                checked_out = False
                                check_in_time = ""
                                check_out_time = ""
                                
                                for line in lines[1:]:
                                    if "ë“±ì›" in line:
                                        if "ë“±ì› -" not in line and "ë“±ì›(" in line:
                                            checked_in = True
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_in_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                    if "í•˜ì›" in line:
                                        if "í•˜ì› -" not in line and "í•˜ì›(" in line:
                                            checked_out = True
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_out_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                
                                result[name] = {
                                    'checked_in': checked_in,
                                    'checked_out': checked_out,
                                    'check_in_time': check_in_time,
                                    'check_out_time': check_out_time
                                }
                    break
        except:
            pass
            
        return result
        
    def create_student_widget(self, name):
        """í•™ìƒ ìœ„ì ¯ ìƒì„±"""
        frame = tk.Frame(
            self.student_frame,
            bg='#1b5e20',
            relief=tk.RAISED,
            borderwidth=1,
            height=60
        )
        
        # ì´ë¦„
        name_label = tk.Label(
            frame,
            text=name[:15],
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 11, 'bold'),
            bg='#1b5e20',
            fg=self.fg_color,
            width=15
        )
        name_label.pack(side='left', padx=5, pady=5)
        
        # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„
        time_label = tk.Label(
            frame,
            text="",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 10),
            bg='#1b5e20',
            fg='lightgreen',
            width=12
        )
        time_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„
        remain_label = tk.Label(
            frame,
            text="",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14, 'bold'),
            bg='#1b5e20',
            fg='lightgreen',
            width=20
        )
        remain_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ê°œë³„ ì‹œê°„ ì¡°ì ˆ ë²„íŠ¼
        btn_frame = tk.Frame(frame, bg='#1b5e20')
        btn_frame.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        minus_btn = tk.Button(
            btn_frame,
            text="-10",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 8),
            bg='#F44336',
            fg='white',
            command=lambda: self.adjust_student_time(name, -10),
            width=4,
            height=1
        )
        minus_btn.pack(side='left', padx=1)
        
        plus_btn = tk.Button(
            btn_frame,
            text="+10",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 8),
            bg='#2196F3',
            fg='white',
            command=lambda: self.adjust_student_time(name, 10),
            width=4,
            height=1
        )
        plus_btn.pack(side='left', padx=1)
        
        return {
            'frame': frame,
            'name': name_label,
            'time': time_label,
            'remain': remain_label,
            'buttons': btn_frame,
            'minus_btn': minus_btn,
            'plus_btn': plus_btn
        }
    
    def update_student_widget(self, name):
        """ê°œë³„ í•™ìƒ ìœ„ì ¯ë§Œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸"""
        if name not in self.student_widgets or name not in self.students:
            return
            
        widget = self.student_widgets[name]
        student_info = self.students[name]
        
        # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
        check_in_time = student_info['actual_check_in_time']
        widget['time'].config(text=f"ë“±ì›: {check_in_time.strftime('%H:%M')}")
        
        # í•˜ì›í•œ ê²½ìš°
        if student_info.get('checked_out'):
            widget['frame'].config(bg='#616161')
            widget['name'].config(bg='#616161')
            widget['time'].config(bg='#616161', fg='#BDBDBD')
            widget['remain'].config(bg='#616161')
            widget['buttons'].config(bg='#616161')
            
            # í•˜ì› ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
            if student_info.get('actual_check_out_time'):
                check_out = student_info['actual_check_out_time']
                widget['remain'].config(
                    text=f"í•˜ì› {check_out.strftime('%H:%M')}",
                    fg='#BDBDBD'
                )
            else:
                widget['remain'].config(text="í•˜ì›", fg='#BDBDBD')
            
            # ë²„íŠ¼ ë¹„í™œì„±í™”
            widget['minus_btn'].config(state='disabled')
            widget['plus_btn'].config(state='disabled')
        else:
            # ìˆ˜ì—… ì¤‘ì¸ ê²½ìš°
            end = student_info['end_time']
            remain = end - datetime.now()
            
            # ë²„íŠ¼ í™œì„±í™”
            widget['minus_btn'].config(state='normal')
            widget['plus_btn'].config(state='normal')
            
            if remain.total_seconds() > 0:
                total_minutes = int(remain.total_seconds() // 60)
                
                # ì‹œê°„ í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸
                if total_minutes >= 60:
                    hours = total_minutes // 60
                    minutes = total_minutes % 60
                    if minutes > 0:
                        time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„ {minutes}ë¶„"
                    else:
                        time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„"
                else:
                    time_text = f"{total_minutes}ë¶„"
                
                # ìƒ‰ìƒ ê²°ì •
                if total_minutes > 30:
                    bg_color = '#1b5e20'
                    fg_color = 'lightgreen'
                elif total_minutes > 10:
                    bg_color = '#F57C00'
                    fg_color = 'white'
                else:
                    bg_color = '#E65100'
                    fg_color = 'yellow'
                
                widget['frame'].config(bg=bg_color)
                widget['name'].config(bg=bg_color)
                widget['time'].config(bg=bg_color)
                widget['remain'].config(bg=bg_color, text=time_text, fg=fg_color)
                widget['buttons'].config(bg=bg_color)
            else:
                # ì‹œê°„ ì´ˆê³¼ - í•˜ì› ì˜ˆì • ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
                expected_time = end.strftime('%H:%M')
                
                widget['frame'].config(bg='#b71c1c')
                widget['name'].config(bg='#b71c1c')
                widget['time'].config(bg='#b71c1c')
                widget['remain'].config(
                    bg='#b71c1c',
                    text=f"í•˜ì›ì˜ˆì • {expected_time}",
                    fg='white'
                )
                widget['buttons'].config(bg='#b71c1c')
                
                # ì•Œë¦¼ìŒ
                if not student_info.get('alerted'):
                    winsound.Beep(1000, 300)
                    self.students[name]['alerted'] = True
        
    def update_ui(self, current_data):
        """UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸"""
        # ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒë§Œ í•„í„°ë§
        checked_in_students = {name: data for name, data in current_data.items() 
                              if data.get('checked_in', False)}
        
        # ìƒˆë¡œ ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒ ì²˜ë¦¬
        for name in checked_in_students:
            data = checked_in_students[name]
            
            # ì²˜ìŒ ë³´ëŠ” í•™ìƒì´ë©´ ì •ë³´ ì €ì¥
            if name not in self.students:
                actual_check_in = self.parse_time(data.get('check_in_time', ''))
                if actual_check_in is None:
                    actual_check_in = datetime.now()
                
                self.students[name] = {
                    'checked_in': True,
                    'actual_check_in_time': actual_check_in,
                    'class_minutes': self.default_class_minutes,
                    'end_time': actual_check_in + timedelta(minutes=self.default_class_minutes),
                    'checked_out': data.get('checked_out', False),
                    'check_out_time': data.get('check_out_time', ''),
                    'actual_check_out_time': None
                }
            
            # í•˜ì› ì •ë³´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
            if data.get('checked_out') and not self.students[name].get('checked_out'):
                self.students[name]['checked_out'] = True
                self.students[name]['check_out_time'] = data.get('check_out_time', '')
                self.students[name]['actual_check_out_time'] = self.parse_time(data.get('check_out_time', ''))
        
        # ì •ë ¬: ìˆ˜ì—…ì¤‘ì¸ í•™ìƒ (ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ìˆœ) + í•˜ì›í•œ í•™ìƒ
        active_students = []
        departed_students = []
        
        for name in checked_in_students:
            student_info = self.students.get(name, {})
            if student_info.get('checked_out'):
                departed_students.append(name)
            else:
                end = student_info.get('end_time', datetime.now())
                remain = (end - datetime.now()).total_seconds()
                active_students.append((name, remain))
        
        # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ìˆœìœ¼ë¡œ ì •ë ¬
        active_students.sort(key=lambda x: x[1])
        
        # ìˆœì„œ ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ìƒì„±
        ordered_names = [name for name, _ in active_students] + departed_students
        
        # ë°ì´í„° ë³€ê²½ í™•ì¸ (ê¹œë¹¡ì„ ë°©ì§€)
        data_changed = False
        if set(ordered_names) != set(self.student_widgets.keys()):
            data_changed = True
        
        # ìœ„ì ¯ì´ ì—†ê±°ë‚˜ ìˆœì„œê°€ ë³€ê²½ëœ ê²½ìš°ë§Œ ì¬ë°°ì¹˜
        if data_changed:
            # ê¸°ì¡´ ìœ„ì ¯ ì œê±°
            for widget_info in self.student_widgets.values():
                widget_info['frame'].destroy()
            self.student_widgets = {}
            
            # ìœ„ì ¯ ì¬ìƒì„±
            row = 0
            
            # êµ¬ë¶„ì„  ì¶”ê°€ ìœ„ì¹˜ ê¸°ì–µ
            separator_row = len(active_students)
            
            for name in ordered_names:
                if name not in self.student_widgets:
                    widget = self.create_student_widget(name)
                    
                    # í•˜ì›í•œ í•™ìƒ ì „ì— êµ¬ë¶„ì„  ì¶”ê°€
                    if row == separator_row and departed_students:
                        separator = tk.Frame(self.student_frame, bg='#555555', height=2)
                        separator.grid(row=row, column=0, sticky='ew', pady=5)
                        row += 1
                    
                    widget['frame'].grid(row=row, column=0, padx=5, pady=3, sticky='ew')
                    self.student_widgets[name] = widget
                    row += 1
        
        # ê° í•™ìƒ ìœ„ì ¯ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        for name in self.student_widgets:
            self.update_student_widget(name)
        
        # í†µê³„ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        active_count = len(active_students)
        departed_count = len(departed_students)
        self.count_label.config(text=f"ìˆ˜ì—…ì¤‘: {active_count}ëª…")
        self.departed_label.config(text=f"í•˜ì›: {departed_count}ëª…")
        
        # 1ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        if self.monitoring:
            self.root.after(1000, lambda: self.update_ui(self.current_data))
            
    def run(self):
        """ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", self.on_close)
        self.root.mainloop()
        
    def on_close(self):
        """ì¢…ë£Œ"""
        self.monitoring = False
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
        self.root.destroy()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = FinalAttendanceGUI()
    app.run()

"""

class FinalAttendanceGUI:

    def setup_ui(self):

        )
        title.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ë²„íŠ¼ í”„ë ˆì„
        button_frame = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        button_frame.pack(pady=10)
        
        # ì‹œì‘ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.start_btn = tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="â–¶ ì‹œì‘",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#4CAF50',
            fg='white',
            command=self.start_monitoring,
            width=15,
            height=2
        )
        self.start_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ ë²„íŠ¼
        self.login_btn = tk.Button(
            button_frame,
            text="âœ“ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14),
            bg='#2196F3',
            fg='white',
            command=self.confirm_login,
            width=15,
            height=2,
            state='disabled'
        )
        self.login_btn.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ìƒíƒœ í‘œì‹œ
        self.status_label = tk.Label(
            self.root,
            text="ëŒ€ê¸° ì¤‘...",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg=self.fg_color
        )
        self.status_label.pack()
        
        # í†µê³„ í”„ë ˆì„
        stats_frame = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        stats_frame.pack(pady=5)
        
        self.count_label = tk.Label(
            stats_frame,
            text="ìˆ˜ì—…ì¤‘: 0ëª…",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg='#4CAF50'
        )
        self.count_label.pack(side='left', padx=10)
        
        self.departed_label = tk.Label(
            stats_frame,
            text="í•˜ì›: 0ëª…",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 12, 'bold'),
            bg=self.bg_color,
            fg='#9E9E9E'
        )
        self.departed_label.pack(side='left', padx=10)
        
        # ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ í”„ë ˆì„
        container = tk.Frame(self.root, bg=self.bg_color)
        container.pack(fill='both', expand=True, padx=20, pady=10)
        
        canvas = tk.Canvas(container, bg=self.bg_color, highlightthickness=0)
        scrollbar = ttk.Scrollbar(container, orient="vertical", command=canvas.yview)
        
        self.student_frame = tk.Frame(canvas, bg=self.bg_color)
        
        canvas.create_window((0, 0), window=self.student_frame, anchor="nw")
        canvas.configure(yscrollcommand=scrollbar.set)
        
        self.student_frame.bind(
            "<Configure>",
            lambda e: canvas.configure(scrollregion=canvas.bbox("all"))
        )
        
        canvas.pack(side="left", fill="both", expand=True)
        scrollbar.pack(side="right", fill="y")
        
        self.student_widgets = {}
        self.current_data = {}
        self.last_update_data = {}  # ê¹œë¹¡ì„ ë°©ì§€ìš©
    
    def parse_time(self, time_str):
        """ì‹œê°„ ë¬¸ìì—´ íŒŒì‹± (ì˜¤ì „/ì˜¤í›„ í¬í•¨)"""
        if not time_str:
            return None
        
        try:
            time_str = time_str.strip()
            is_pm = "ì˜¤í›„" in time_str
            
            time_part = time_str.replace("ì˜¤ì „", "").replace("ì˜¤í›„", "").strip()
            if ":" in time_part:
                hour, minute = time_part.split(":")
                hour = int(hour)
                minute = int(minute)
                
                if is_pm and hour != 12:
                    hour += 12
                elif not is_pm and hour == 12:
                    hour = 0
                
                today = datetime.now().date()
                return datetime.combine(today, datetime.min.time().replace(hour=hour, minute=minute))
        except:
            pass
        
        return None
    
    def adjust_student_time(self, name, minutes):
        """ê°œë³„ í•™ìƒ ìˆ˜ì—… ì‹œê°„ ì¡°ì ˆ"""
        if name in self.students:
            student = self.students[name]
            current_minutes = student.get('class_minutes', self.default_class_minutes)
            new_minutes = current_minutes + minutes
            
            # ì œí•œ ì„¤ì •
            if new_minutes < 30:
                new_minutes = 30
            elif new_minutes > 240:
                new_minutes = 240
            
            student['class_minutes'] = new_minutes
            student['end_time'] = student['actual_check_in_time'] + timedelta(minutes=new_minutes)
            
            # ìœ„ì ¯ë§Œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ (ì¬ìƒì„± í•˜ì§€ ì•ŠìŒ)
            self.update_student_widget(name)
        
    def start_monitoring(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.start_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.run_browser, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
        
    def run_browser(self):
        """ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì € ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.driver = webdriver.Chrome()
        self.driver.get("https://attok.co.kr/")
        
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ë¸Œë¼ìš°ì €ì—ì„œ ë¡œê·¸ì¸ í›„ 'ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ' ë²„íŠ¼ì„ ëˆŒëŸ¬ì£¼ì„¸ìš”"))
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.login_btn.config(state='normal'))
    
    def confirm_login(self):
        """ë¡œê·¸ì¸ ì™„ë£Œ í™•ì¸"""
        self.login_btn.config(state='disabled')
        self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì‹œì‘ ì¤‘...")
        
        thread = threading.Thread(target=self.start_monitoring_loop, daemon=True)
        thread.start()
    
    def start_monitoring_loop(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ë£¨í”„ ì‹œì‘"""
        self.monitoring = True
        self.root.after(0, lambda: self.status_label.config(text="ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ì¤‘..."))
        
        self.monitor_thread()
        
    def monitor_thread(self):
        """ëª¨ë‹ˆí„°ë§ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œ"""
        while self.monitoring:
            students = self.get_students()
            self.current_data = students
            
            # UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ëŠ” ë©”ì¸ ìŠ¤ë ˆë“œì—ì„œ
            self.root.after(0, self.update_ui, students)
            
            time.sleep(10)
            
    def get_students(self):
        """í•™ìƒ ì •ë³´ ì¶”ì¶œ"""
        result = {}
        
        try:
            ul_elements = self.driver.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "ul")
            
            for ul in ul_elements:
                li_items = ul.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "li")
                
                if 70 <= len(li_items) <= 90:
                    for li in li_items:
                        strong_tags = li.find_elements(By.TAG_NAME, "strong")
                        
                        if not strong_tags or not any("ë°°ê²½" in s.text for s in strong_tags):
                            text = li.text.strip()
                            if text:
                                lines = text.split('\n')
                                name = lines[0].strip()
                                
                                checked_in = False
                                checked_out = False
                                check_in_time = ""
                                check_out_time = ""
                                
                                for line in lines[1:]:
                                    if "ë“±ì›" in line:
                                        if "ë“±ì› -" not in line and "ë“±ì›(" in line:
                                            checked_in = True
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_in_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                    if "í•˜ì›" in line:
                                        if "í•˜ì› -" not in line and "í•˜ì›(" in line:
                                            checked_out = True
                                            if "(" in line and ")" in line:
                                                check_out_time = line[line.index("(")+1:line.index(")")]
                                
                                result[name] = {
                                    'checked_in': checked_in,
                                    'checked_out': checked_out,
                                    'check_in_time': check_in_time,
                                    'check_out_time': check_out_time
                                }
                    break
        except:
            pass
            
        return result
        
    def create_student_widget(self, name):
        """í•™ìƒ ìœ„ì ¯ ìƒì„±"""
        frame = tk.Frame(
            self.student_frame,
            bg='#1b5e20',
            relief=tk.RAISED,
            borderwidth=1,
            height=60
        )
        
        # ì´ë¦„
        name_label = tk.Label(
            frame,
            text=name[:15],
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 11, 'bold'),
            bg='#1b5e20',
            fg=self.fg_color,
            width=15
        )
        name_label.pack(side='left', padx=5, pady=5)
        
        # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„
        time_label = tk.Label(
            frame,
            text="",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 10),
            bg='#1b5e20',
            fg='lightgreen',
            width=12
        )
        time_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„
        remain_label = tk.Label(
            frame,
            text="",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 14, 'bold'),
            bg='#1b5e20',
            fg='lightgreen',
            width=20
        )
        remain_label.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        # ê°œë³„ ì‹œê°„ ì¡°ì ˆ ë²„íŠ¼
        btn_frame = tk.Frame(frame, bg='#1b5e20')
        btn_frame.pack(side='left', padx=5)
        
        minus_btn = tk.Button(
            btn_frame,
            text="-10",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 8),
            bg='#F44336',
            fg='white',
            command=lambda: self.adjust_student_time(name, -10),
            width=4,
            height=1
        )
        minus_btn.pack(side='left', padx=1)
        
        plus_btn = tk.Button(
            btn_frame,
            text="+10",
            font=('ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•', 8),
            bg='#2196F3',
            fg='white',
            command=lambda: self.adjust_student_time(name, 10),
            width=4,
            height=1
        )
        plus_btn.pack(side='left', padx=1)
        
        return {
            'frame': frame,
            'name': name_label,
            'time': time_label,
            'remain': remain_label,
            'buttons': btn_frame,
            'minus_btn': minus_btn,
            'plus_btn': plus_btn
        }
    
    def update_student_widget(self, name):
        """ê°œë³„ í•™ìƒ ìœ„ì ¯ë§Œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸"""
        if name not in self.student_widgets or name not in self.students:
            return
            
        widget = self.student_widgets[name]
        student_info = self.students[name]
        
        # ì¶œì„ ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
        check_in_time = student_info['actual_check_in_time']
        widget['time'].config(text=f"ë“±ì›: {check_in_time.strftime('%H:%M')}")
        
        # í•˜ì›í•œ ê²½ìš°
        if student_info.get('checked_out'):
            widget['frame'].config(bg='#616161')
            widget['name'].config(bg='#616161')
            widget['time'].config(bg='#616161', fg='#BDBDBD')
            widget['remain'].config(bg='#616161')
            widget['buttons'].config(bg='#616161')
            
            # í•˜ì› ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
            if student_info.get('actual_check_out_time'):
                check_out = student_info['actual_check_out_time']
                widget['remain'].config(
                    text=f"í•˜ì› {check_out.strftime('%H:%M')}",
                    fg='#BDBDBD'
                )
            else:
                widget['remain'].config(text="í•˜ì›", fg='#BDBDBD')
            
            # ë²„íŠ¼ ë¹„í™œì„±í™”
            widget['minus_btn'].config(state='disabled')
            widget['plus_btn'].config(state='disabled')
        else:
            # ìˆ˜ì—… ì¤‘ì¸ ê²½ìš°
            end = student_info['end_time']
            remain = end - datetime.now()
            
            # ë²„íŠ¼ í™œì„±í™”
            widget['minus_btn'].config(state='normal')
            widget['plus_btn'].config(state='normal')
            
            if remain.total_seconds() > 0:
                total_minutes = int(remain.total_seconds() // 60)
                
                # ì‹œê°„ í…ìŠ¤íŠ¸
                if total_minutes >= 60:
                    hours = total_minutes // 60
                    minutes = total_minutes % 60
                    if minutes > 0:
                        time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„ {minutes}ë¶„"
                    else:
                        time_text = f"{hours}ì‹œê°„"
                else:
                    time_text = f"{total_minutes}ë¶„"
                
                # ìƒ‰ìƒ ê²°ì •
                if total_minutes > 30:
                    bg_color = '#1b5e20'
                    fg_color = 'lightgreen'
                elif total_minutes > 10:
                    bg_color = '#F57C00'
                    fg_color = 'white'
                else:
                    bg_color = '#E65100'
                    fg_color = 'yellow'
                
                widget['frame'].config(bg=bg_color)
                widget['name'].config(bg=bg_color)
                widget['time'].config(bg=bg_color)
                widget['remain'].config(bg=bg_color, text=time_text, fg=fg_color)
                widget['buttons'].config(bg=bg_color)
            else:
                # ì‹œê°„ ì´ˆê³¼ - í•˜ì› ì˜ˆì • ì‹œê°„ í‘œì‹œ
                expected_time = end.strftime('%H:%M')
                
                widget['frame'].config(bg='#b71c1c')
                widget['name'].config(bg='#b71c1c')
                widget['time'].config(bg='#b71c1c')
                widget['remain'].config(
                    bg='#b71c1c',
                    text=f"í•˜ì›ì˜ˆì • {expected_time}",
                    fg='white'
                )
                widget['buttons'].config(bg='#b71c1c')
                
                # ì•Œë¦¼ìŒ
                if not student_info.get('alerted'):
                    winsound.Beep(1000, 300)
                    self.students[name]['alerted'] = True
        
    def update_ui(self, current_data):
        """UI ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸"""
        # ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒë§Œ í•„í„°ë§
        checked_in_students = {name: data for name, data in current_data.items() 
                              if data.get('checked_in', False)}
        
        # ìƒˆë¡œ ì¶œì„í•œ í•™ìƒ ì²˜ë¦¬
        for name in checked_in_students:
            data = checked_in_students[name]
            
            # ì²˜ìŒ ë³´ëŠ” í•™ìƒì´ë©´ ì •ë³´ ì €ì¥
            if name not in self.students:
                actual_check_in = self.parse_time(data.get('check_in_time', ''))
                if actual_check_in is None:
                    actual_check_in = datetime.now()
                
                self.students[name] = {
                    'checked_in': True,
                    'actual_check_in_time': actual_check_in,
                    'class_minutes': self.default_class_minutes,
                    'end_time': actual_check_in + timedelta(minutes=self.default_class_minutes),
                    'checked_out': data.get('checked_out', False),
                    'check_out_time': data.get('check_out_time', ''),
                    'actual_check_out_time': None
                }
            
            # í•˜ì› ì •ë³´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
            if data.get('checked_out') and not self.students[name].get('checked_out'):
                self.students[name]['checked_out'] = True
                self.students[name]['check_out_time'] = data.get('check_out_time', '')
                self.students[name]['actual_check_out_time'] = self.parse_time(data.get('check_out_time', ''))
        
        # ì •ë ¬: ìˆ˜ì—…ì¤‘ì¸ í•™ìƒ (ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ìˆœ) + í•˜ì›í•œ í•™ìƒ
        active_students = []
        departed_students = []
        
        for name in checked_in_students:
            student_info = self.students.get(name, {})
            if student_info.get('checked_out'):
                departed_students.append(name)
            else:
                end = student_info.get('end_time', datetime.now())
                remain = (end - datetime.now()).total_seconds()
                active_students.append((name, remain))
        
        # ë‚¨ì€ ì‹œê°„ ìˆœìœ¼ë¡œ ì •ë ¬
        active_students.sort(key=lambda x: x[1])
        
        # ìˆœì„œ ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ìƒì„±
        ordered_names = [name for name, _ in active_students] + departed_students
        
        # ë°ì´í„° ë³€ê²½ í™•ì¸ (ê¹œë¹¡ì„ ë°©ì§€)
        data_changed = False
        if set(ordered_names) != set(self.student_widgets.keys()):
            data_changed = True
        
        # ìœ„ì ¯ì´ ì—†ê±°ë‚˜ ìˆœì„œê°€ ë³€ê²½ëœ ê²½ìš°ë§Œ ì¬ë°°ì¹˜
        if data_changed:
            # ê¸°ì¡´ ìœ„ì ¯ ì œê±°
            for widget_info in self.student_widgets.values():
                widget_info['frame'].destroy()
            self.student_widgets = {}
            
            # ìœ„ì ¯ ì¬ìƒì„±
            row = 0
            
            # êµ¬ë¶„ì„  ì¶”ê°€ ìœ„ì¹˜ ê¸°ì–µ
            separator_row = len(active_students)
            
            for name in ordered_names:
                if name not in self.student_widgets:
                    widget = self.create_student_widget(name)
                    
                    # í•˜ì›í•œ í•™ìƒ ì „ì— êµ¬ë¶„ì„  ì¶”ê°€
                    if row == separator_row and departed_students:
                        separator = tk.Frame(self.student_frame, bg='#555555', height=2)
                        separator.grid(row=row, column=0, sticky='ew', pady=5)
                        row += 1
                    
                    widget['frame'].grid(row=row, column=0, padx=5, pady=3, sticky='ew')
                    self.student_widgets[name] = widget
                    row += 1
        
        # ê° í•™ìƒ ìœ„ì ¯ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        for name in self.student_widgets:
            self.update_student_widget(name)
        
        # í†µê³„ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        active_count = len(active_students)
        departed_count = len(departed_students)
        self.count_label.config(text=f"ìˆ˜ì—…ì¤‘: {active_count}ëª…")
        self.departed_label.config(text=f"í•˜ì›: {departed_count}ëª…")
        
        # 1ì´ˆ í›„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸
        if self.monitoring:
            self.root.after(1000, lambda: self.update_ui(self.current_data))
            
    def run(self):
        """ì‹¤í–‰"""
        self.root.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", self.on_close)
        self.root.mainloop()
        
    def on_close(self):
        """ì¢…ë£Œ"""
        self.monitoring = False
        if self.driver:
            self.driver.quit()
        self.root.destroy()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    app = FinalAttendanceGUI()
    app.run()
